SA16n1278:334: (u) citte dveṣasmṛtimutpādya satvān tāḍayituṃ vihisituṃ vā icchati |

SA16n1278:609: nānālakṣaṇā bhāvanā nānālakṣaṇāya saṃvartata iti yat kaścit pañcāṅgabhūtasamādhīnupādāyārhatphalaṃ pañcābhijñāśca sākṣātkaroti |

SA16n1278:663: yaduktaṃ yathā na kaścit bālakrīḍāyāmabhiramata iti |

SA16n1278:736: antarbahiśca no paśyan ahaṃ pṛcchāmi vastvidam || iti |
SA16n1278:738: yathoktaṃ ṣaḍdhātusūtre-yo bhikṣavaḥ pañcasu dhātuṣu atyantanirviṇṇaḥ,
SA16n1278:756: (u) tīrthikā vimokṣādhimuktyā rūpalakṣaṇaṃ vināśayanti na tu śūnyabhāvanayā |
SA16n1278:758: yathābhāvanādhimuktiprayogaṃ mṛtaparityaktaṃ kāyaṃ śmāśānikakṛmayo bhakṣayanti ityādi paśyanti |
SA16n1278:762: (u) tīrthikānāṃ satyapi ārūpyasamādhau [tatra] āsaṅgānna[sa] vimokṣa ityucyate |
SA16n1278:763: āryāḥ punarārūpyasamādhimupādāya caturaḥ skandhān rogata ityādyaṣṭabhirākāraiḥ
SA16n1278:772: na tu vivicya ayaṃ cittanirodhaḥ ayaṃ kleśakṣaya iti |
SA16n1278:778: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre nirodhasamāpattimupasampanno bhikṣuḥ kṛtakaraṇīya iti |
SA16n1278:782: (u) sūtra uktaṃ śaikṣo navānupūrvasamādhīn labhata iti |
SA16n1278:784: yogāvacaro yadi kṣayanirodhaṃ pratilabdhvā na dhyānasamādhīn samāpadyate |
SA16n1278:786: yadi dhyānasamādhīn samāpadyate na kṣayanirodhaṃ labhate |
SA16n1278:793: ubhābhyāṃ bhāgābhyāṃ vimukta ubhayato[bhāga] vimukta ityucyate |
SA16n1278:794: (pṛ) anupūrva[vihāre]ṣu nirodho vimokṣeṣu nirodhaśca kiṃ nānā |
SA16n1278:807: naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ samāpannasya ākiñca nyāyatanasaṃjñā niruddhā bhavati |
SA16n1278:808: nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannasya saṃjñā ca vedanā ca niruddhā bhavati |
SA16n1278:810: eṣu nirodheṣu nirodho viśiṣṭo yaduta yogāvacaro rāgadveṣamohebhyo nirviṇṇo vimucyate |
SA16n1278:811: (pṛ) kathaṃ jñāyate anupūrveṣu cittacaittānāṃ nirodhaḥ vimokṣeṣu kleśānāṃ nirodha iti |
SA16n1278:821: jñātavyaṃ nirvāṇaṃ sakṣātkurvataḥ sarve kleśā nirudhyanta iti |
SA16n1278:829: kathaṃ sa kāyacittaśūnyatāṃ labhate kleśāṃśca kṣapayati |
SA16n1278:843: samāpattiḥ dhyānavimokṣasamādhiṣu vaśitābalalābhaḥ yathāha-śāriputraḥ-saptabodhyaṅgeṣu samāpattiṃ vyutthānañca vaśīkaromi iti |
SA16n1278:850: yadyupekṣācittaṃ nāsti tadāsamāpattiṃ samāpadyate iti nāsti dūṣaṇam |
SA16n1278:851: yathoktaṃ sūtre-yogāvacaraścatura ṛddhipādān samyagabhyasan himavantaṃ parvatarājaṃ tathā dhamati yathā reṇuparyavasannaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1278:853: ato jñāyate aṣṭavimokṣeṣūcyate āsravakṣayanirodhaḥ na nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyata iti |
SA16n1278:857: svabhāvaḥ astyākiñcanyāyatanasvabhāvaḥ asti naivasaṃjñāsaṃjñāyatanasvabhāvaḥ asti nirodhasvabhāvaḥ |
SA16n1278:865: pañcaskandhān prajñaptilakṣaṇān yo na paribhedayati tasyā'vidyā bhavati |
SA16n1278:868: yathā bhagavān ekaṃ bhikṣumanuśāsti-śūnyeṣu sarvasaṃskāreṣu saṃskārān śūnyān bhāvayitvā damaya svacittam iti |
SA16n1278:869: yathā kaścitpradīpamādāya śūnyāgāraṃ praviśya paśyati sarvaṃ śūnyamiti |
SA16n1278:877: (pṛ) ime svabhāvāḥ kaṃ samādhiṃ niśritya pratilabhyante |
SA16n1278:878: (u) sūtra uktam-vidyāsvabhāvo yāvat naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasvabhāvaḥ sarvaṃ khayaṃ samādhisamāpattiviharaṇātpratilabhate yaduta saṃskṛtamārgaviharaṇātpratilabhata iti |
SA16n1278:881: dvitīyasvabhāvo'pi rūpopādāno rupamupādāya tathā vivecayati yathā śūnyaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1278:883: sarve saṃskṛtadharmāḥ śūnyā iti nirodhasamāpattyā nirodhaṃ pratilabhate |
SA16n1278:885: ato jñāyate atrokto nirodhaḥ kṣayanirodho nirvāṇamiti |
SA16n1278:887: (u) yogāvacaro rūpaparibhedecchayā kāmadhātupratilabdhaṃ samādhiṃ vā rūpadhātupratilabdhaṃ vā samādhiṃ niśrayamāṇo rūpaṃ śūnyaṃ pratilabhate |
SA16n1278:889: (pṛ) eṣu vimokṣeṣu kati sāsravāḥ kati anāsravāḥ |
SA16n1278:893: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī [eko] bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni |
SA16n1278:897: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati adhimātrāṇi[suvarṇadurvarṇānīti vistaro yāvat] idaṃ dvitīya[mabhibhvāyatana]m |
SA16n1278:898: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni [suvarṇadurvarṇānīti yāvat] idaṃ tṛtīya[mabhibhvāyatana]m |
SA16n1278:899: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhī rūpāṇi paśyati adhimātrāṇi [suvarṇadurvarṇānīti yāvat] idaṃ [caturthamabhibhvāyatana]m |
SA16n1278:900: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanirbhāsāni tadyathā umakāpuṣpaṃ[sampannaṃ] vārāṇaseyaṃ vā vastraṃ[nīlaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ nīlanidarśanaṃ nīlanirbhāsam |
SA16n1278:908: na kevalaṃ santīmāni nīlādīni catvāri rūpāṇi |
SA16n1278:917: (u) pūrvaṃ sāsravāṇi santi śūnyatayā rūpāṇāṃ paribhede'nāsravāṇi bhavanti |
SA16n1278:925: prathamaṃ dhyānam-yathoktaṃ sūtre yogāvacaro vivicyaiva kāmai rvivicyākuśalai dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharatīti |
SA16n1278:930: na hi kaściccakṣuṣā rūpaṃ na paśyati |
SA16n1278:939: vyavasāyī khalu rūpādiṣu sthitvaiva kāmaṃ prajahāti |
SA16n1278:940: yathoktaṃ sūtre-rūpādayastadbhāgā na kāmā bhavanti iti |
SA16n1278:942: yasya rāgacittaṃ bhavati sa kāmān paryeṣate |
SA16n1278:953: yadā samādhipariniṣpattyā cittaṃ na bhūyasā vikṣipati tadā vicāraḥ |
SA16n1278:956: prītiriyaṃ prathamalabdhā kāyaṃ sukhayatīti sukhaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1278:961: tadā na syāt pañcāṅgaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam |
SA16n1278:967: tadā saptasambodhyaṅgeṣu prasrabdhibodhyaṅgaṃ na pṛthaguktaṃ syāt |
SA16n1278:972: prathamaṃ dhyānamapi pañcakāma[guṇā]nāṃ pratyāsannamiti [te] aṅgāni vaktavyāni syuḥ |
SA16n1278:982: [tato] vyāvartane punassamādhinimittamupādāya tatrālambane cittaṃ samādhāya maulikaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoti |
SA16n1278:992: yathā śiṣyeṇa saha gacchatīti kiñcidviprarṣe'pi sahetyucyate |
SA16n1278:994: yathā bhūtapīḍitaḥ puruṣo [bhūta] anudgrame'pi pīḍita ityucyate |
SA16n1278:1000: (pṛ) tathā cet kathaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ pañcāṅgamityucyate |
SA16n1278:1002: yathā saptabodhyaṅgāni kālābhisandhiṃ labdhvā caturdaśa bhavanti |
SA16n1278:1011: prītau jātamātrāyāṃ kāyacitte aduṣṭhule sukumāre dānte ca bhavata ityataḥ praśrabdhirityucyate |
SA16n1278:1013: arogiṇaścaturmahābhūtānāmudayaḥ tadā ayaṃ puruṣaḥ sukhīti nāma |
SA16n1278:1016: yathoktaṃ sūtre-saṃskārāṇāmanupūrvanirodhaḥ-tathāhi-prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpannasya vāk niruddhā bhavati |
SA16n1278:1017: yāvannirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannasya saṃjñā vedanā ca niruddhā bhavati |
SA16n1278:1020: yadi mataṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ vitarkavicārasamprayuktamiti tadapi na yuktam |
SA16n1278:1022: uktaṃ hi sūtre-yadi yogāvacaraḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate |
SA16n1278:1023: tadā vāk niruddhā bhavati iti vitarkavicārau ca vāco hetuḥ |
SA16n1278:1033: ato jñāyate prathamadhyāne vitarkavicārau syātām iti |
SA16n1278:1039: (u) prathamadhyāne samādhigataṃ cittaṃ kusume salilavat peśalam |
SA16n1278:1049: [punaśca yogāvacaraḥ] vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamāt adhyātmaṃ samprasādanaṃ cetasa ekotibhāvamavitarkamavicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyadhyānamupasampadya viharati |
SA16n1278:1053: (u) yathā prathamadhyāne duḥkhendriye'satyapi dvitīyadhyāne duḥkhendriyavyupaśama ucyate |
SA16n1278:1058: (u) prathamadhyāne santyapi vijñānāni na duḥkhendriyasyāśrayā bhavanti |
SA16n1278:1061: (u) tathā ce ddaurmanasyendriyaṃ manovijñānasvabhāvajamiti sarvatra bhavet |
SA16n1278:1075: ucyate ca duḥkhasya sukhasya ca prahāṇāt caturthadhyānamupasampadya viharatīti |
SA16n1278:1077: yogāvacaraḥ prathamadhyāne'paripūrṇasamādhiḥ sadā vitarkavicārābhyāṃ vikṣipyata ityata ucyate dvitīdhyāne vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśama iti |
SA16n1278:1083: cetasa ekotibhāvaścetasa ekasmin mārge viharaṇaṃ dhyānamityucyate |
SA16n1278:1116: yathoktaṃ sūtre-yasmin samaye yogāvacaro dharmaṃ śṛṇoti |
SA16n1278:1117: asya pañca nīvaraṇāni tasmin samaye na bhavanti,
SA16n1278:1118: saptabodhyaṅgāni ca tasmin samaye bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchanti |
SA16n1278:1123: pūrvaṃ prītau samutpannāyāṃ paścādanāsravaṃ yadyathābhūtadarśanaṃ pratilabhate |
SA16n1278:1124: na ca sarvāḥ praśrabdhayaḥ prītiṃ pratītya bhavanti |
SA16n1278:1127: na vayaṃ brūmo jñānavinirmukto'sti pṛthagvedanādharma iti |
SA16n1278:1133: bhagavān sadopekṣācitte viharatītyata āha-asti bhagavataḥ prītiriti |
SA16n1278:1141: (pṛ) yathā dvitīyadhyāye'sti prītiḥ nāsti tu daurmanasyam |
SA16n1278:1144: (u) sarveṣu dhyānasamādhiṣu asti daurmanasyaṃ yathā indriyārtheṣūcyate |
SA16n1278:1150: anāsrave citte ca prīti rna bhavet |
SA16n1278:1153: uktaṃ hi sūtre-prathamadvitīyadhyānayoḥ kevalaṃ prītirasti na caitasikaṃ sukhamiti |
SA16n1278:1160: kintu paśyati prathamadhyānagatāni rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni rogato gaṇḍato yāvadanātmataḥ |
SA16n1278:1161: (pṛ) rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato'ghata ityetāni catvāri lokacaritāni nānāsravāṇi |
SA16n1278:1162: ata idaṃ sūtraṃ pramāṇīkṛtya nānāsravaṃ sādhayituṃ śaknoṣi |
SA16n1278:1169: (pṛ) uktaṃ hi sūtre-prītisukhacittena catvāri satyāni pratilabhata iti |
SA16n1278:1175: kiñca tatsūtraṃ prakāśayati na prītyā paramārthajñānaṃ pratilabhata iti |
SA16n1278:1179: prītyāśca virāgādupekṣako viharati smṛtaḥ samprajānan sukhañca kāyena pratisaṃvedayate yadāryā ācakṣante upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārīti tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharati |
SA16n1278:1186: yogāvacaraḥ śāntaṃ tṛtīyadhyānaṃ labhamāno dvitīyadhyānaṃ prajahāti |
SA16n1278:1189: yathā kaścit putrabhāryādibhiḥ sadā na prīto bhavati |
SA16n1278:1192: tathā yogāvacaro'pi prītiṃ prathamata āgatāṃ tu sukhaṃ manyate |
SA16n1278:1196: yogāvacaraḥ kena duḥkhena pīḍitaḥ tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ sukhaṃ manyate |
SA16n1278:1198: yogāvacaro'nayā prītyā pīḍita iti aprītisamādhau sukhasaṃjñāṃ karoti |
SA16n1278:1224: ataḥ sukhañca kāyena pratisaṃvedayata iti nāma |
SA16n1278:1230: puruṣo'yaṃ prajñāyopekṣate yat prītāvādīnavaṃ dṛṣṭvā nirvidyata ityataḥ sūpekṣāṃ labhate |
SA16n1278:1238: (u) nāhamasmin śāstre vadāmi vedanāvyatiriktaṃ pṛthagasti upekṣāsukhamiti |
SA16n1278:1257: sukhasya ca duḥkhasya ca prahāṇātpūrvameva saumanasyadaurmanasyānāmastaṅgamādaduḥkhamasukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharati |
SA16n1278:1269: sukhasya duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt cittaṃ neñjate |
SA16n1278:1283: caturthadhyānaṃ prāpya sukharāgasya prahāṇāt smṛtiḥ pariśuddhā |
SA16n1278:1302: (u) tathā cet aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā nānāsravā syāt |
SA16n1278:1310: atra kāmadoṣo'tisūkṣmaḥ duravabodhaḥ ato'vaśyaṃ vaktavyaṃ syāt |
SA16n1278:1320: parvataṃ vā ārohati tadāśvāsaḥ sthūlo bhavati |
SA16n1278:1346: sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānāmastaṅgamāt nānātvasaṃjñānāmamanaskārā danantam ākāśam ityākāśānantyāyatanamupasampadya viharati |
SA16n1278:1351: etāḥ saṃjñā vividhakleśānāṃ vividhakarmaṇāṃ vividhaduḥkhānāṃ hetavaḥ |
SA16n1278:1355: tatra saṃkṣepānnoktam asya samatikramādasya nirodha iti |
SA16n1278:1356: kecidāhuḥ- sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñeti cakṣurvijñānāśritā saṃjñā iti |
SA16n1278:1362: pratighasaṃjñā nirudhyata iti vadato rūpaṃ saṅgrahītameva |
SA16n1278:1364: rūpasaṃjñāṃ pratighasaṃjñāñca vinā nāsti pṛthaṅmanovijñānāśritaṃ rūpam |
SA16n1278:1371: kiñcāyaṃ kāyo maraṇavipannaḥ smaśānāgninā dagdhaḥ praṇaśyati |
SA16n1278:1372: ato jñāyate kāyo'yaṃ pūrvaṃ sākāśa iti |
SA16n1278:1374: (u) ādita ākāśālambanaḥ svīyaskandhālambanaḥ parakīyaskandhālambanaśca siddho bhavati |
SA16n1278:1376: karuṇāśīrṣaka evaṃ cintayati-sattvā dayanīyā rūpasaṃjñāpīḍitā iti |
SA16n1278:1382: rūpe tu cittaṃ na suprabuddhaṃ nābhiraktaṃ nābhyāsaktam |
SA16n1278:1383: yathoktaṃ sūtre-āryaḥ pañcakāmaguṇān dṛṣṭvā saṃsmaran na tatrābhinandati na prabodhayati nādhyavasāya tiṣṭhati |
SA16n1278:1388: yathā ca yogāvacaro rūpasaṃjñāvivikto'pi ākāśāntena caturthadhyānamavalambate |
SA16n1278:1406: (pṛ) asti punaḥ sūtravacanam-ālokaṃ pratītyākāśaṃ jānīma iti |
SA16n1278:1407: na rūpaṃ vihāyāstyanyo dharma ālokaṃ pratītya jñāpyaḥ |
SA16n1278:1435: (u) ākāśaṃ na pratyakṣadṛśyamiti pūrvameva dūṣitatvāt-yat tamasyapi jñāpyamityādi |
SA16n1278:1445: (u) yo vastusan dharmaḥ sa sarvaḥ pratiṣṭhito bhavati |
SA16n1278:1452: rūpe rūpaṃ pratihanyate rūpamasati viruddharūpe vivardhate |
SA16n1278:1464: abhāvamātreṇa kṛtakāstitālābhādabhāvadharma iti jñāyate ato'yaṃ samādhiradita ākāśamavalambate |
SA16n1278:1467: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ-arūpasamāpattayo nirodhālambanā api ayaṃ anumānajñānabhāgīyaṃ nirodhamātramālambate |
SA16n1278:1480: yathā kāmadhātau rūpadhātau cābhijñābalādanyasmin rūpe anyasmin citte sthito'pi na cyavate |
SA16n1278:1487: samādhiṃ vinā yadi saṃkleśaḥ yadi vā vvavadānam sarvamākāśānantyāyatanamityākhyāyate ? ||
SA16n1278:1490: sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ samatikramya [anantaṃ vijñānamiti] vijñānānantyāyatanamupasampadya viharati |
SA16n1278:1494: tathā yogāvacaro'pi ākāśaṃ pratītya rūpaṃ paribhedayan [ākāśa]mapi parijihīrṣati |
SA16n1278:1495: vijñānānantyāyatanamiti yogāvacaro vijñānenānantamākāśamityavalambamānaḥ tadā anantaṃ vijñāna [mapi ālambate] |
SA16n1278:1502: tatpariśramanirviṇṇo vijñānaṃ paribhidya tatparijihīrṣayā ākiñcanyāyatanamupasampadya viharati |
SA16n1278:1509: saṃjñā ca duḥkhopāyāyāsāya bhavati rogato gaṇḍataḥ |
SA16n1278:1510: yasya saṃjñā nāsti sa punarmūḍho bhavati |
SA16n1278:1513: yogāvacaraḥ saṃjñāṃ vipadaṃ āsajñikaṃ sammohaṃ paśyati |
SA16n1278:1521: yadi rūpadhātau cittaṃ niroddhumalaṃ bhavanti kasmādārūpyadhātau nālam |
SA16n1278:1524: idānīṃ punaścittaṃ nirudhyate rūpacittayoryugapannirodhaṃ paśyata utrāsasammohaḥ syāt |
SA16n1278:1534: yathā nirmitagataṃ rūpam nirmitacitte punaḥ phalamutpādayati |
SA16n1278:1539: asaṃjñi samāpattau ca na cittaṃ nirudhyeta |
SA16n1278:1545: yathoktaṃ sūtre-dīrgharātraṃ [hyetat bhikṣavaḥ] aśrutavataḥ] pṛthagjanasya adhyavasitaṃ mamāyitaṃ parāmṛṣṭam etanmama eṣo'hamasmi eṣa ma ātmeti |
SA16n1278:1547: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre-tīrthikāḥ trayāṇāmupādānānāṃ samucchedaṃ nirodhamupadiśanti nātmavādopādānasya iti |
SA16n1278:1549: yathā markaṭopamasūtram [aśrutavān] pṛthagjanaḥ kāyaṃ virajyeta na cittam |
SA16n1278:1550: varaṃ [bhikṣavaḥ aśrutavān] pṛthagjana imaṃ cāturmahābhautikaṃ kāya[mātmata] upagacchet na tveva cittam |
SA16n1278:1552: dṛśyate'yaṃ [bhikṣava ścāturmahābhautikaḥ] kāya [ekamapi varṣaṃ] tiṣṭhan.....daśa varṣāṇi [tiṣṭhan] yāvacchatavarṣāṇyapi tiṣṭhan |
SA16n1278:1553: yacca khalu [etadbhikṣava] ucyate cittamityapi mana ityapi vijñānamityapi tat rātyāśca divasasya cātyayena anyadevotpadyate anyannirudhyate |

SA16n1278:2379: ayaṃ hi kāyo durgandhamalairaśuciścarmāvṛtatvātparaṃ na jñāyate |
SA16n1278:2393: evaṃ vinīlakalohitakādilakṣaṇaṃ dīrghakālaṃ bhāvayato'śubha[saṃjñā] sampūrṇā bhavati |
SA16n1278:2406: maraṇasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayataḥ svasya hitaṃ bhavati yaduta cittaikāgryeṇa kuśaladharmāṇāmupacayaḥ |
SA16n1278:2407: laukikāḥ sattvā bhūyasā parihitābhiratā svahitaṃ tyajantyeva |
SA16n1278:2410: ājavañjavamanughāvatāṃ hi lokānāṃ sadā maraṇaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1278:2420: mṛṇmayo'yaṃ ghaṭo yadi [samyak] prayogapālitaḥ kadācit ciraṃ tiṣṭhet |
SA16n1278:2421: ayaṃ kāyastu ciratamaṃ tiṣṭhamāno na vatsaraśatamatikrāmati |
SA16n1278:2424: saṃkṣepataḥ sarve sattvā asattvāśca kāyasya paripanthino dharmā draṣṭavyāḥ |
SA16n1278:2426: kiñca yogī paśyati kāyaḥ kṣaṇikanityo vipariṇāmalakṣaṇo naikaṃ kṣaṇamapyārakṣya iti |
SA16n1278:2428: yogī dṛṣṭadharme ca paśyati bālyayauvanavārdhakyāni savyādhīni nirvyādhīni vā na maraṇaparihārīṇīti |
SA16n1278:2439: na sāntvavacanenollāpanīyaṃ dhanenānuneyaṃ vigraheṇa vā mocanīyam |
SA16n1278:2440: yathā mahati śaile caturbhyo digbhya āgate nāsti palāyanasthānam |
SA16n1278:2445: kevalaṃ parāmṛśati kiṃ kuśalacārī kiṃ vākuśalacārīti |
SA16n1278:2447: ato yogī kāyo'niśrayo'śaraṇo maraṇavartmagata iti paśyan maraṇasaṃjñāmanusmarati |
SA16n1278:2448: kiñca yogī sadā paśyati kāyo'yaṃ jarāvyādhiparipīḍito'dhruvasvabhāvaḥ pratikṣaṇamutpannavināśī vijñānasantānavinaṣṭa ityato maraṇasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayati |
SA16n1278:2449: kiñcāyaṃ yogī paśyati maraṇaṃ niyataṃ jīvitamaniyatam |
SA16n1278:2459: uktañca sūtre-maraṇaṃ nāma mahātāmastram araśmikamarakṣaṇam asahāyakamanupasthāpakaṃ paramabhayasthānaṃ iti |
SA16n1278:2462: traidhātuke sarvasyāsti maraṇaṃ na tathā jarā vyādhiśca |
SA16n1278:2476: yathā caturṣu samyakpradhāneṣūktam-utpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya [chandaṃ janayati vyāyamati] vīryamārabhate |
SA16n1278:2478: ime ca pāpakā akuśalā dharmā narakādiduḥkhakleśānāṃ pratyayāḥ |
SA16n1278:2485: (pṛ) imāṃ prahāṇasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayan kiṃ hitaṃ vidante |
SA16n1278:2486: (u) tāṃ saṃjñāṃ bhāvayan sadā na pāpakān dharmānanuvartate |
SA16n1278:2490: kleśaprahāṇābhirati dharmacī varasaṃvṛtaliṅgasya pravrajitasya hitam tayā nocet svakāyameva manyeta |
SA16n1278:2500: yathoktaṃ sūtre-kāmarāgasya prahāṇāt pañcaskandhāḥ prahīyante iti |
SA16n1278:2509: uktañca sūtre-trayaḥ svabhāvāḥ prahāṇasvabhāvo virāgasvabhāvo nirodhasvabhāva iti |
SA16n1278:2510: yaducyate prahāṇasvabhāvo virāgasvabhāva iti tadarhata eva bhavati |
SA16n1278:2512: yaducyate nirodhasvabhāva iti tadāyuṣo'nte jīvitavyapagame prahīṇasantānasya |
SA16n1278:2515: yadabhihitaṃ prahāṇamiti tat avidyāṃ prajahātīti prajñā vimucyate |
SA16n1278:2516: yadvirāga iti tat tṛṣṇāṃ vivarjayatīti ceto vimucyate |
SA16n1278:2523: yo'nityasaṃjñāṃ yāvannirodhasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayati sa kṛtasarvakṛtyo niruddhasarvakleśaḥ prahīṇaskandhasaṃyojanasantatirnirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇaṃ samāpadyate |
SA16n1278:2529: yasmāt sati samādhipariṣkāre samādhiḥ sidhyati na tvasati |
SA16n1278:2545: mṛṣāvāda piśunavācā paruṣavācā sampralāpa itīme catvāri vācikakarmāṇi |
SA16n1278:2549: tathā hi tadyathā suvarṇakāraḥ pūrvaṃ sthūlamalamapanayati |
SA16n1278:2558: imāṃ samāṃ bhūmiṃ vyavasthāpya catvāri satyāni paśyati iti |
SA16n1278:2564: pūrva śīlabhedāpattiṃ śīlasamādānahitañca pratisaṃkhyayā vicārya śīlaṃ samādatte |
SA16n1278:2572: tathā kleśavyādhicikitsāyā asati śīle na sampadyata auṣadham |
SA16n1278:2582: pariśuddhaśīlo na vikṣipatītyato niyamena nirvāṇamadhigacchati gaṅgāstrotasi dāruskandhavat |
SA16n1278:2592: yathā pārarahite kṣetre jalaṃ na tiṣṭhati |
SA16n1278:2602: tathāgatamārgārthī mahākaruṇācittena sarvasattvānāṃ kṛte na śīlalakṣaṇaṃ samādatte |
SA16n1278:2606: uktaṃ hi sūtre-dvau khalvāyuṣman pratyayau samyakdṛṣṭerutpādāya parato ghoṣo yoniśo manaskāra iti |
SA16n1278:2609: (u) uktaṃ hi sūtre-[anyataro]'rhan bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati sma ekānte niṣaṇṇasya mama evamabhavat-abhisambodhisampadā tu mārgapratilābhasya vikalaḥ pratyaya iti |
SA16n1278:2611: maivaṃ vocaḥ yā'bhisaṃbodhiḥ sā tu mārgasya pratilābhasya sakalaḥ pratyayaḥ |
SA16n1278:2613: jātijarāvyādhimaraṇāḥ sattvā ātmano'bhisambodhiṃ labhamānā hi jātijarāvyādhimaraṇebhyo vimucyante iti |
SA16n1278:2615: tadyathā sālavṛkṣo himavantamupādāya pañca vastūni vardhayati |
SA16n1278:2622: tadaiva smṛtirudapādi pratilabdho mayā dharmaḥ yamupādāyābhisambuddhaḥ tameva dharmamupaniśrayiṣya iti |
SA16n1278:2623: brahmādayo deva api prāśaṃsan nāsti kaścit buddhādviśiṣṭaḥ,
SA16n1278:2626: yathā kaścit sacakṣuṣko'pi pradīpaṃ vinā na paśyati |
SA16n1278:2627: tathā yoginaḥ puṇyaguṇatīkṣṇendriyatāpratyaye satyapi abhisambodhiṃ vinā na bhavati kaścanopakāraḥ |
SA16n1278:2630: sarve ca sajjanāḥ saddharme pratitiṣṭhanti [iti sā] sarvā devamanuṣyalokeṣvabhisambodhiḥ |
SA16n1278:2638: indriyāṇāmagopane nimittodgrahaṇāt kleśāḥ pañcendriyāṇi strotovat pravartayanti |
SA16n1278:2640: ya indriyeṣu guptadvāro bhavati tasya śīlādayaḥ sudṛḍhā bhavanti |
SA16n1278:2646: yaḥ saddharmāduparamate tasya mārgo na bhavati |
SA16n1278:2648: yadi kaścit kuśalasya bhāvanāyai na bhunakti |
SA16n1278:2657: (u) yat bhojanaṃ śītoṣṇādi vyādhiṃ kāmakrodhādyādhiñca na vardhayati |
SA16n1278:2660: bhojanamidamasmin kāle śītoṣṇakāmakrodhādhivyādhiṃ vardhayatīti prajānan na bhuñjyāt |
SA16n1278:2661: (pṛ) tīrthikā vadanti-yaḥ pariśuddhamāhāraṃ bhuṅkte sa pariśuddhaṃ puṇyaṃ vindate |
SA16n1278:2662: yat yatheṣṭhamabhimatarūparasagandhasparśavat approkṣitamabhinimantritaṃ bhuñjyate tat pariśuddhamityucyate |
SA16n1278:2675: āhāraḥ pūrvamevāśuciḥ paścādapi kāyaṃ praviṣṭo naikadhā'śucirbhavati |
SA16n1278:2679: (u) prāṇātipātādviratiradattādānādviratirmithyā jīvādviratirityādinā anurūpamāhāraṃ labdhvā āhāre ca pratikūlasaṃjñāṃ dṛṣṭvā prajñājalaprokṣitamatha tāvadbhuṅkte |
SA16n1278:2690: kathaṃ kaścit loke corāṇāṃ raṇabhūmau nidrāsyati |
SA16n1278:2705: yadi kaścidanidrannapi akuśalavitarkānutpādayati yaduta kāmavitarko vyāpādavitarko vihiṃsāvitarko jātivitarko janapadavitarko'maraṇavitarkaḥ parānugrahavitarkaḥ parāvamanyanāvitarka ityādayaḥ |
SA16n1278:2710: yat kāmaṃ niśritya pañcakāmaguṇeṣūtpannavitarkaḥ paśyati hitaṃ sukhamiti |
SA16n1278:2730: [yatkhalu bhikṣo divā karmāntānārabhya rātrā] vanuvitarkayati [anuvicārayati] idaṃ [rātrau] dhūmāyanam |

SA16n1278:2760: yogī [kaścit] cintayati-amuko janapadaḥ sukhaḥ kṣemaḥ śivaḥ,
SA16n1278:2761: tatra gatvā nibhṛtaṃ sukhaṃ lapsya iti |
SA16n1278:2770: evamādayo vividhā doṣāḥ santītyato na cintayet |

SA16n1278:2774: sarvo janapado dūrata eva śrāvyo nāvaśyaṃ gatvā ślāghanīyaḥ |
SA16n1278:2778: duḥkhahetumimaṃ kāyaṃ dhṛtvā yatra yatra gacchati tatra tatra duḥkhānyanubhavati |
SA16n1278:2787: kalyāṇamitramupasthāya caturastūpān vanditvā janāna mahādānaṃ kartuṃ protsāhya ca paścānmārgo bhāvayitavya iti |
SA16n1278:2793: vṛttyantareṣu vyāpṛtena na mārgo bhāvituṃ śakyaḥ |
SA16n1278:2795: mayā'yaṃ kāyo vṛthā poṣitaḥ na kiñcillabdham |
SA16n1278:2797: yathoktaṃ sūtre-pṛthagjano viṃśatidhā svacittaṃ nigṛhyevaṃ cintayet-vibhinnākāraveṣamātraṃ mama vṛthā [sarvaṃ] na kiñcillabdham,
SA16n1278:2802: akṛtyaṃ te na sevante nityaṃ sātatyakāriṇaḥ |
SA16n1278:2809: ko jñānī tṛṇāgre'vaśyāyabinduvat jīvitamadhruvaṃ jñātvā kṣaṇamekaṃ jīveyamiti [manyeta] |
SA16n1278:2810: uktañca sūtre-bhagavānavocat kathaṃ pūnaryūyaṃ bhikṣavo bhāvayatha maraṇasmṛtim |
SA16n1278:2811: [anyataro bhikṣu] rbhagavantamavocat-[iha mamaivaṃ bhavati-aho vata] ahaṃ sapta varṣāṇi na jīveyamiti |
SA16n1278:2813: anya[taro bhikṣurbhagavantametadavocat] ahaṃ ṣaḍ varṣāṇi na jīveyamiti |
SA16n1278:2815: evamukte bhagavān tān bhikṣūnetadavocat-yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ pramattā [viharatha,
SA16n1278:2817: anyataro bhikṣu [rbhagavanta]mupetyāvocat[mamaivaṃ bhavati aho bata] ahaṃ [tadantaraṃ] na jīveyaṃ yadantaraṃ āśvasitvā praśvasāmi praśvasitvā vā''śvasāmi iti |
SA16n1278:2818: bhagavānavocat-sādhu sādhu tvaṃ [khalu bhikṣo] bhāvayasi maraṇasmṛtim iti |
SA16n1278:2825: nānayā smṛtyā parasya sukhaṃ dukhaṃ vā prāpayati |
SA16n1278:2828: (u) yogī mārgamarthayan cintayetpāramārthikaṃ hitaṃ yaduta anityatādi |
SA16n1278:2845: sarveṣāṃ sattvānāmadhyātmaṃ bahirdhā ca duḥkhavihiṃsā'pi samā na viṣamā |
SA16n1278:2863: yathoktaṃ tathāgatavarge-tathāgatasya khalu dvau vitarkau nityamupatiṣṭhato yaduta yogakṣemavitarkaḥ pravivekavitarkaśca iti |
SA16n1278:2871: kiñca yogī pravivekāmilāṣayā bahūnāṃ kuśaladharmāṇāmupacayādāśu vimucyate |
SA16n1278:2872: aṣṭamahāpuruṣavitarka iti alpecchasyāyaṃ dharmo nā[yaṃ dharmo] mahecchasya |
SA16n1278:2879: niṣprapañcārāmasyāyaṃ dharmo nāyaṃ dharmaḥ prapañcārāmasya itīme'ṣṭau |
SA16n1278:2884: kaścit [kenacit] kāraṇena vā śīlāya vā parasya cittaprasādanāya vālpaṃ gṛhṇāti na tu santuṣṭacitto bhavati |
SA16n1278:2895: na tu yathā laukikā yaśomaṇḍanavardhanāya bahu gṛhṇānti |
SA16n1278:2899: pravrajito na bahu sañcinvannavadātavasanaiḥ samo bhavet |
SA16n1278:2914: dṛśyate ca deyasya padārthasya pratyarpaṇaṃ duṣkaram |
SA16n1278:2917: yathāha bhagavān-nāhaṃ lābhasatkāramanuprāpnomi mā lābhasatkāro māmanuprāpnotviti |
SA16n1278:2919: yathāha bhagavān-devā na pratilabhante naiṣkramyasukhaṃ pravivekasukhamupaśamasukhaṃ yathā mayā pratilabdham |
SA16n1278:2923: samīkṣe sarvavastūni kheṭapiṇḍān yathā bahiḥ || iti |
SA16n1278:2924: kiñca yogī paśyati na kāmopabhogena tṛptirbhavati |
SA16n1278:2925: yathā lavaṇodakaṃ piban na tarṣaṇamapanayati iti prajñāṃ prarthayānastṛpto bhavati |
SA16n1278:2926: mahecchaḥ sadā prārthanāmutpādayan bahu prārthayitvā'lpaṃ vindate |
SA16n1278:2928: paśyāmaśca bhikṣārthī janairavamanyate na satkriyate yathā'lpecchaḥ |
SA16n1278:2932: pravivikta iti yat gṛhasthapravrajitayoḥ kāyikapravivekasamācāraḥ kleśeṣu mānasapravivekasamācāraḥ ayaṃ pravivekaḥ |
SA16n1278:2935: avadātavasanādayaḥ tatsthānagatastrīrūpavikṣepāvakṛṣṭā na tatra kadācitsukhino bhavanti |
SA16n1278:2941: bhagavān grāmopakaṇṭhe niṣaṇṇaṃ bhikṣuṃ dṛṣṭvā aprītamanasko bhavati |
SA16n1278:2942: śūnyāyatane ca śayānaṃ bhikṣuṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavān prītamanasko bhavati |
SA16n1278:2944: grāmopakaṇṭhe niṣṣaṇṇasya bhikṣorbahubhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ samāhitacittavikṣepe labdhavyaṃ na labhyate sākṣātkartavyaṃ na sākṣātkriyate |
SA16n1278:2945: śūnyāyatane śayānasya kiñcitkausīdye satyapi samādhyāśāsambhave cittaṃ parigṛhyate |
SA16n1278:2948: śūnyāyatane na rūpādīni nimittāni santīti kleśāḥ suprahāṇāḥ |
SA16n1278:2950: uktañcasūtre-yo bhikṣuḥ saṅgaṇikāvihārarataḥ sambhāṣyarataḥ[sa] gaṇādavivikta ityataḥ sāmayikīmeva vimuktiṃ na pratilabhate |
SA16n1278:2951: kaḥ punarvādaḥ akopyāṃ vimuktiṃ pratilabhata iti |
SA16n1278:2957: yogī yadi samyakpradhānamācaran akuśaladharmān prajahāti kuśaladharmāṃśca sañcinoti |
SA16n1278:2966: ārabdhavīryasya ca kṣaṇe kṣaṇe kuśaladharmo nityamabhivardhate,
SA16n1278:2968: vīryaprakṛṣṭamācarannāpnoti prakṛṣṭaṃ sthānaṃ yaduta buddhānāṃ gatim |
SA16n1278:2969: yathoktaṃ sūtre bhagavatā ānandaṃ prati prakṛṣṭaṃ vīryamabhyasan buddhagatiṃ yātīti |
SA16n1278:2977: evaṃ kusīdasya doṣamārabdhavīryasya guṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā vīryamanusmarati |
SA16n1278:2980: (pṛ) eṣāṃ caturṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ smṛtyā kīdṛśaṃ hitaṃ vindate |
SA16n1278:2983: yathā ca ghaṭaḥ pūrṇo na punarudakamādatte |
SA16n1278:2984: evamasya puruṣasya kuśaladharmasampūrṇasya na pāpakāni prasajyante |
SA16n1278:2985: yo bhāvitasamyaksmṛtikaḥ sa vimuktibhāgīyān sarvān kuśaladharmān saṅgṛhṇāti |
SA16n1278:2986: yathā samudrāmbupāyinaḥ sarvāṇi strotāṃsi pītāni bhavanti |
SA16n1278:2990: asya ca cittaṃ supratiṣṭhitaṃ duṣkampanaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1278:2993: yathoktaṃ bhikṣuṇīsūtre-bhikṣuṇya ānandametadavocan-iha bhadanta [ānanda] vayaṃ catṛṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu supratiṣṭhitacittā viharantya [udāraṃ] pūrveṇāparaṃ viśeṣaṃ samprajānāma iti |
SA16n1278:2997: yathoktaṃ sūtre- samāhito yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti iti |
SA16n1278:2998: anena manuṣyakāyenātimānuṣadharmo bhavati yaduta kāyenodakarmamagniñcā[vagāhya] nirgacchati |
SA16n1278:3000: kiñcāsya sukhaṃ bhavati yat yāvaddevāḥ sahāṃpatibrahmādayo'pi nāpnuvanti |
SA16n1278:3003: samāhitasya saddharmaḥ sadā vardhate samāhitasya cittaṃ nānutapyate |
SA16n1278:3009: yadi samāhitasya siddhirbhavati tadā āryamārgasya pratilābho bhavati |
SA16n1278:3013: na hi dānādinā īdṛśaṃ kāryaṃ pratilabhate yadekāntataḥ pāpakānāmakaraṇam |
SA16n1278:3014: yathoktaṃ sūtre-yo daharo yuvā ājanma maitrīṃ bhāvayati |
SA16n1278:3023: yogī sarvāṇi laukikāni lokottarāṇi smaranneva kuryāt na klamathena kāryaṃ prayojayan |
SA16n1278:3024: anye pudgalāstena labdhaṃ pramātuṃ cittameva notpādayanti |
SA16n1278:3029: tadaiva nirudhyante yathā taptāyaḥpātre patitā jalakaṇikā |
SA16n1278:3032: tadaiva nirudhyante yathā tṛṇāgre'vaśyāyabinduḥ sūrya uditamātre śuṣyati |
SA16n1278:3043: prajñāvān bhagavacchāsane samāhito na kampate tadyathā śailo na vāyunā kampyate |
SA16n1278:3051: yathā ānandaḥ śāriputraṃ pṛcchati-ṣaṇṇām [āyuṣman] sparśāyatanānāmaśeṣavirāganirodhādasti anyatkiñcit |
