SA16n1278:3066: yadi paśyati sattvaṃ śūnyaṃ dharmāśca śūnyā iti sa niṣprapañcārāmaḥ |
SA16n1278:3080: (u) yogī lokamanityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyamanātmakaṃ dṛṣṭvā nirvāṇe upaśamasaṃjñāmutpādayati |
SA16n1278:3083: yadi vā kalyāṇamitrāt yadi vā sūtrādhyayanāt saṃsāra ādīnavaṃ śṛṇoti |
SA16n1278:3094: śraddhāvān nāma[yaḥ] triṣu ratneṣu caturṣu satyeṣu ca vigatavicikitso bhavati |
SA16n1278:3104: adhimuktakulotpannaḥ śrāddhena sahavṛttikaḥ sadādhimukticittaṃ bhāvayan apratilabdhasamādhirapi vicikitsāṃ na karoti | evamādi |
SA16n1278:3115: ato'gniṃ manthāno na viramamāṇo sahasāgniṃ vindate |
SA16n1278:3117: prajñāvattvena caturṇāmaṅgānāṃ phalaṃ bhavati yaduta mārgaphalam |
SA16n1278:3123: sarveṣāṃ pāpakānāṃ parivarjanaṃ sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ sañcayaśca yogino'ṅgam |
SA16n1278:3126: ihaśāstā [anyataro vā] gurusthānīyaḥ [sa brahmacārī] bhikṣūnāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati |
SA16n1278:3128: tathā tathā [tasmin dharme] arthapratisaṃvedī ca dharmapratisaṃvedī ca bhavati |
SA16n1278:3134: yatra bhikṣo [rapramattasyātāpinaḥ] prahitātmano viharato['vimuktaṃ] cittaṃ vimucyate |
SA16n1278:3140: pañcamaṃ samādhinimittasya sugrahaṇaṃ yaduta navanimittādīni yathāpūrvamuktāni |
SA16n1278:3141: (pṛ) śāstā [anyataro] vā gurusthānīyaḥ sabrahmacārī kasmāt bhikṣūṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati |
SA16n1278:3148: ime pudgalā viśuddhaśīlādiguṇasampannāḥ tadyathā subhājanaṃ samṛddhiṃ samādātuṃ bhavyam ityato dharmadeśanāṃ karoti |
SA16n1278:3151: abhābhyāmubhābhyāṃ jāyate prītiḥ yāvatsamāhitasya yathābhūtajñānaṃ jāyate |
SA16n1278:3153: āsāṃ trisṛṇāṃ prajñānāṃ trīṇi phalāni bhavanti yaduta nirvedo vairāgyaṃ vimuktiḥ |
SA16n1278:3154: dharmaṃ śrutvā'dhītya ca pareṣāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati |
SA16n1278:3185: asminnupaśamadharme śrotā vā adhyetā vā anuvicintayitā vā kṣipraṃ vimucyate |
SA16n1278:3190: prajñayā āsravāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ vindate na puṇyaṃ gauravaṃ vā |
SA16n1278:3195: ānandaḥ kasmāt prathame'ntime ca yāme vimuktiṃ nālabhata |
SA16n1278:3196: (u) ānando na yāvanmastakamupadhāne nyadhatta tāvadeva vimuktimalabhata |
SA16n1278:3209: yo'kṣaṇebhyomuktaḥ sa mārgaṃ samādātuṃ bhavyo bhavati |
SA16n1278:3211: [tāni] pratirūpadeśavāsaḥ satpuruṣopāśrayaḥ ātmasamyakpraṇidhiḥ pūrve ca kṛtapuṇyatā iti |
SA16n1278:3212: [sa] catvāri srotaāpattyaṅgāni ca sādhayati yaduta satpuruṣasaṃvāsaḥ saddharmaśravaṇaṃ,
SA16n1278:3215: yathoktaṃ sūtre-trīn dharmānaprahāya na jarāvyādhimaraṇāni santarati | iti |
SA16n1278:3232: [iha bhikṣurekatya ekatyo]'nyataraṃ devanikāyaṃ praṇidhāya brahmacaryaṃ carati |
SA16n1278:3245: yadi kaścitkāyāsaktaḥ sukhī bhavatītyato['paraḥ] kaścidāgatya laghu nindati |
SA16n1278:3251: nandirāgādayo madhyaugha āvartaḥ pūtibhāvo'pi ca na syuḥ |
SA16n1278:3258: yathā kumbhasadṛśaṃ stanamiti vacanaṃ tadākāramātraṃ gṛhṇāti na kāṭhinyaṃ mārdavaṃ vā |
SA16n1278:3259: yathā ca candropamaṃ vadanamiti vacanaṃ śobhā pauṣkalyaṃ gṛhṇāti na tadākāram |
SA16n1278:3261: na tu yathāyaṃ dāruskandhaḥ strotomadhyagatastasmin pāre'smin vā āsajyate pūtībhavati vā | ityādi |
SA16n1278:3262: śāstrācārya āha-yathā gaṅgāstroto niyamena mahārṇavaṃ prāpnoti |
SA16n1278:3268: ānāpānasya ṣoḍaśākārā yaduta sasmṛta evāśvasiti smṛta eva praśvasiti |
SA16n1278:3269: dīrghaṃ vā āśvasan dīrghamāśvasimīti prajānāti dīrghaṃ vā praśvasan dīrghaṃ praśvasimīti prajānāti ||
SA16n1278:3304: tathā yogyapi audārike citte pravṛtte hrasvaṃ [śvasati] |
SA16n1278:3306: dīrghaṃ śvasatīti yadi yogī sūkṣmacitte sthitaḥ,
SA16n1278:3310: yathā tasyaiva klāntasya viśrāntasya āśrāsapraśvāsā sūkṣmā anupatanti |
SA16n1278:3311: tasmin samaye dīrghā aśvāsa praśvāsā bhavanti |
SA16n1278:3313: yogī kāye tucchādhimuktaḥ sarvaromakūpeṣu vāyumantarbahiścāriṇaṃ paśyati |
SA16n1278:3315: dhātubalalābhino vyupaśāntacittasya yogina audārikā āśvāsapraśvāsā vyupaśāntā bhavanti |
SA16n1278:3332: vedanāyāṃ rāgo jāyata ityato vedanāṃ cittasaṃskāraṃ paśyati |
SA16n1278:3338: yogī praśrambhayan vedanāsvādaṃ paśyati cittaṃ śāntaṃ na līnaṃ noddhatam |
SA16n1278:3354: (pṛ) kasmādānāpānasmṛtirāryavihāra iti divyavihāra iti brahmavihāra iti śaikṣavihāra iti aśaikṣavihāra iti cocyate |
SA16n1278:3365: (u) aśubhabhāvanayā alabdhavairāgyasya ātmadurviṇṇasya kāyacitte vyāmohite syātām |
SA16n1278:3368: yathā valgumuttitīrṣayā bhikṣavo'śubhabhāvanayā atīva nirviṇṇā viṣapānabhṛgupatanādibhirvividhairātmānaṃ dhnanti sma |
SA16n1278:3369: na tathā ime ṣoḍaśākārā vairāgyaprāpakā api na durnivedajanakā bhavantītyato viśiṣyante |
SA16n1278:3377: sarve hi kleśā vitarkaṃ pratītya jāyante |
SA16n1278:3387: yathā anyadvastu smarati citte sadā āśvāsapraśvāsā bhavanti |
SA16n1278:3389: yathā ca pratibimbaṃ svayaṃ pravartate na puruṣaḥ karoti |
SA16n1278:3404: ānāpānavihīnabhūmigatasya tasmin samaye [tadbhūmi ścitta] mapi nāsti |
SA16n1278:3414: [ṣaṭ pratyayā] yaduta gaṇanā anubandhanā śamatho vipaśyanā vivartanaṃ pariśuddhiḥ |
SA16n1278:3416: triprakārā gaṇanā samā vā atiriktā vā nyūnā vā |
SA16n1278:3417: samā nāma daśasu satsu daśeti gaṇayati |
SA16n1278:3421: vipaśyanā nāma yogī āśvāsapraśvāsān kāyānubaddhān maṇiṣu sūtravatpaśyati |
SA16n1278:3423: vivartanaṃ nāma cittaṃ pratītya kāyasya pravṛttiḥ,
SA16n1278:3426: pariśuddhirnāma yogini sarvakleśaiḥ sarvākṣaṇaiśca vimukte cittaṃ pariśudhyati |
SA16n1278:3430: yato yogī kevalamānāpāne cittaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayan sarvān vitarkānupacchedayati |
SA16n1278:3431: yaḥ ṣoḍaśavidhamācarituṃ samarthaḥ sa paripūrṇa ityucyate |
SA16n1278:3440: pañcaskandheṣu nirākṛteṣu prajñaptirnirākṛteti kaḥ punarupayoga ānāpānasmṛtyā |
SA16n1278:3451: uktañca sūtre yogī ānāpānaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ dīrgha[māśvasan] vā [śikṣate] hrasvaṃ vā sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī vā praśrambhayan kāyasaṃskāraṃ vā [śikṣate] |
SA16n1278:3457: anyasmin sūtretūktam-yogī ānāpāne [sthitaḥ] kāye samudayadharmānudarśī vyayadharmānudarśī,
SA16n1278:3465: yathoktaṃ sūtre-mamaudārikaṃ prītiprāmodyaṃ cittasya dūṣaṇamabhūt iti |
SA16n1278:3469: (u) yoginaḥ śūnya tāmanusmarato na prītipramodyaṃ jāyate |
SA16n1278:3470: asti sattva iti saṃjñayā hi prītiprāmodyaṃ jāyate |
SA16n1278:3473: yogī evamanusmaret-hetupratyayai vividhā dharmā jāyate yadutātapālokādayo dharmāḥ |
SA16n1278:3475: ye prītiprāmodyakarā dharmāḥ te sarve parimārgitā vyagravikṣepakā iti paśyato yogina audārikaṃ prītiprāmodyaṃ nirudhyate |
SA16n1278:3479: yogī nirodhalakṣaṇaṃ lābhaṃ paśyatītyato nātapālokādibhiḥ [tasya] prītiprāmodyaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1278:3480: ayaṃ yogī upaśamaṃ bhāvayan kleśānāṃ kṣayamicchati |
SA16n1278:3485: loke yāni bhairavasthānāni tāni sarvāṇi yogī paśyati |
SA16n1278:3486: tāni sarvāṇi anityaṃ vikṣepakamiti parīkṣya [tāni] nānuvidadhīta |
SA16n1278:3496: na hiṃsāprayogapratyaya ityanusmarato na bhavati bhīrutā |
SA16n1278:3497: yogyayaṃ mārge paramābhirata ityataḥ kāyajīvite'napekṣo bhavati |
SA16n1278:3520: yathā vā dāntā vīṇāyāstantryo'tyāyatā vā'tiśithilā vā ubhayathā na svaraṃ sādhayanti |
SA16n1278:3548: punastrividhaṃ samādhau samāpattilakṣaṇaṃ sthitilakṣaṇaṃ vyutthānalakṣaṇam iti |
SA16n1278:3551: yadāha-ahameva samādhimupasampadya viharāmi na tu sa itīdaṃ mānaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1278:3552: yadāha-sa evopasampadya viharati nāhamitīdaṃ mānakalpaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1278:3557: yathoktaṃ sūtre-yo bhikṣurekadharmeṇa samanvitaḥ sa na paśyati cakṣuranityamiti |
SA16n1278:3559: (pṛ) sarve'vītarāgāḥ sattvā kiṃ na paśyanti cakṣuranityamiti |
SA16n1278:3561: pratyutpanne samutpannarāgo na paśyati cakṣuranityamiti iti vaktavyam |
SA16n1278:3567: sūtre coktā srayodaśa kṛṣṇadharmāḥ samādhipratikūlāḥ trayodaśa śukladharmāḥ samādhyanukūlāḥ |
SA16n1278:3573: atha santi trayo dharmāḥ ayoniśomanaskāro duścaritamatilīnacittatā |
SA16n1278:3576: atha santi trayo dharmā auddhatyamindriyeṣvaguptadvāratā śīlavipannatā |
SA16n1278:3577: atha santi trayo dharmāḥ asrāddhyaṃ dauśśīlyaṃ kausīdyamiti |
SA16n1278:3578: atha santi trayo dharmāḥ sajjane'ratiḥ saddharmaśravaṇe dveṣaḥ paradoṣaprakaṭane prītiḥ |
SA16n1278:3579: ata santi trayo dharmaḥ agauravatā saṃkathyadūṣaṇaṃ duṣprajñasevanam |
SA16n1278:3580: trīn dharmānaprahāya na prajahāti asatkāraṃ saṃkathyadūṣaṇaṃ duṣprajñasevanam [katame trayaḥ | ]
SA16n1278:3582: ahrīkyamanapatrāpyaṃ pramādaṃ prahāya prajahāti asatkāraṃ saṃkathyadūṣaṇaṃ duṣprajñasevanam |
SA16n1278:3583: [evaṃ] yāvatsatkāyadṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataparāmarśaṃ vicikitsāṃ prajahan prajahāti rāgadveṣamohān jarāvyādhimaraṇāni ca tarati |
SA16n1278:3588: muṣitasmṛtyasaṃ prajanyavikṣiptacittānāṃ samuccheda eva yat caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ bhāvanā |
SA16n1278:3593: ahrīkyānapatrāpyapramādānāñca samuccheda eva yat gṛhiṇaḥ pariśuddhiḥ |
SA16n1278:3594: kasmāt | yat kaścit rahogataḥ pāpakaṃ kṛtvā na lajjate tadāhrīkyam |
SA16n1278:3595: yat sa pāpakacittapravṛtterūrdhvaṃ saṅghamadhye'pi pāpakaṃ kṛtvā nāpatrapate |
SA16n1278:3601: evaṃ sati ācāryaṃ parivarjya ciraṃ durjanopasadanaṃ duṣprajñasevanam |
SA16n1278:3605: ato'śrāddho bhūtvā dauḥśīlyaṃ samādāya kusīdo bhavati |
SA16n1278:3606: durjanaṃ sevamānaḥ [ārya]śāsanamaśraddadhāna āha-nāsti duṣkṛtasya vipāka iti |
SA16n1278:3607: duṣkṛtamācaran vipākaṃ vindata iti śṛṇvanmātro vā kukkaṭaśvādidharmaṃ samādāyātyantikapāpameva kāṅkṣate |
SA16n1278:3609: kausīdyāt sajjane'prīto bhavati yat tattvato nāsti samyak caryāvihārīti |
SA16n1278:3610: saddharmaśravaṇaṃ dviṣan āha samyak caritadharmā mithyādharmāḥ nāsti tataḥ kaścanopakāra iti |
SA16n1278:3611: cittakaṣāyāt paradoṣaprakaṭane prīta āha-parasya dharmacaryāto matsadṛśaṃ nāsti kiñcilabdhamiti |
SA16n1278:3620: cittasya mohāt na trīṇi saṃyojanāni samucchedayati |
SA16n1278:3625: tasmin varṣe māse ayane samādhimamukaṃ nālabha iti cintayato yoginaḥ śoko jāyate |
SA16n1278:3630: saṃkṣipya yāvaccīvarapiṇḍapātādayo dharmāḥ kuśalamūlāpakarṣaḥ akuśalamūlaprakarṣaśca sarvāṇi samādherapakṣālāni bhavanti |
SA16n1278:3634: (pṛ) bhagavān tatra tatra sūtre bhikṣūnāmantryāha-[iha bhikṣuḥ] araṇyagato vāyatanagato vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā śūnyāgāragato vā manasi kuryāt dvau dharmau yaduta śamatho vipaśyanāca iti |
SA16n1278:3639: sarve ca kuśaladharmā bhāvanājātā iti dvāvimau parigṛhītau |
SA16n1278:3672: laukikāḥ sattvāḥ sarve sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā iti dvayorantayoḥ patitāḥ |
SA16n1278:3703: (pṛ) yadi śamatho vipaśyanā cittaṃ bhāvayati prajñāṃ bhāvayati |
SA16n1278:3720: yathoktaṃ sūtre-yogī nirāmiṣāṃ prītiṃ labhamānaḥ sāmiṣāṃ prītiṃ jahāti iti |
SA16n1278:3724: avidyāprahāṇāddhi rāgādayaḥ kleśāḥ prahīyante nirudhyante nāvaśiṣyante |
SA16n1278:3730: asti ca dvidhā vimuktiḥ sāmayikavimuktiḥ akopyavimuktiriti |
SA16n1278:3738: samayavimukto hi yat adhikabalena kañcitkālaṃ saṃyojanāni vighnayati nātyantaṃ prajahāti |
SA16n1278:3756: ato māraḥ śaikṣo vivṛttakāyaskandhaṃ mṛta iti ācaturdigantaṃ tadvijñāpanāya yena bhagavān tenopasaṃkramya bhagavantametadavocat |
SA16n1278:3759: atha khalu bhagavān [māra iti viditvā ta] mavocat |
SA16n1278:3774: nāsti tu kaścit [kevalaṃ] śamathaṃ spṛṣṭvā rāgamātyantikaṃ prajahātīti |
SA16n1278:3775: tathā cet tīrthikā api rāgamātyantikaṃ prajahyuḥ |
SA16n1278:3790: yadi smṛtyupasthānādīni nirvedhabhāgīyāni spṛṣṭvā cittaṃ parigṛhṇāti |
SA16n1278:3792: sarve ca yogino dvāvimau dharmau niśritya cittaṃ nirudhya vimuktiṃ spṛśanti ||
SA16n1278:3798: (u) pratyakṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ khalu kāyikaṃ karma pratikṣaṇavināśyapi bhāvanāvaśādvibhinnakauśalaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1278:3799: bhāvanāvaśāt ciraṃ punaḥ punaḥ pravartyamānaṃ sat sukaraṃ bhavati |
SA16n1278:3801: anuvihitāvṛtti āvṛttyā ca praguṇīkṛtaṃ dṛḍhībhūtañca susmaraṇaṃ bhavati yathādhyayanādi |
SA16n1278:3802: mānasaṃ karma ca kṣaṇikamapi bhāvayitavyamiti jñātavyam |
SA16n1278:3808: yathā kaścit punaḥ punarmaithunacittaṃ bhāvayan bahūn kāmānabhinirvartayati |
SA16n1278:3810: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo yadvastucittaṃ manasi karoti sa tatra pratipannaḥ |
SA16n1278:3814: ato jñāyate cittamidaṃ kṣaṇikamapi bhāvayitavyaṃ bhavatīti |
SA16n1278:3821: tadyathā bījādaṅkuramaṅkurātkāṇḍaṃ kāṇḍānnāḻaṃ nāḻāt patraṃ patrātpuṣpaṃ puṣpātphalamiti pratyakṣato hetuto'nupūrvaṃ vivardhate |
SA16n1278:3823: pratyakṣato dṛṣṭaṃ khalu vāsitatilasya gandhaḥ saṃṅgkrātyā vardhata iti |
SA16n1278:3826: ato jñāyate kṣaṇikā dharmā api bhāvayitavyā iti |
SA16n1278:3831: (u) nāsti kaścidvidyamānadharmaḥ sarve ca dharmāḥ kṣaṇikā iti pūrvameva sādhitam |
SA16n1278:3835: svarūpata eva sadāsthitasya bhāvanayā ka upakāraḥ |
SA16n1278:3845: ato'prāptaṃ na bhāvyata iti tava vacanaṃ na dūṣaṇāya bhavati |
SA16n1278:3846: pratyakṣato dṛśyate ca hetuphalayorayaugapadye'pi bhavatyeva hetoḥ phalaṃ bhavatīti |
SA16n1278:3849: evaṃ prajñā pūrvacitaṃ bhāvayati tadurdhvacittamupacitaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1278:3862: yathā bhavatāṃ sūtra uktaṃ-agnisaṃyogādaṇuṣu kṛṣṇavarṇe niruddhe raktavarṇaṃ jāyata iti |
SA16n1278:3865: yadyādāvagnisaṃyuktadharmasya raktavarṇamutpadyata iti punaḥ paścādagnisaṃyuktadharmaḥ kimartham |
SA16n1278:3870: yadi bhavatāmabhisandhiḥ raktavarṇaṃ kramaśo jāyata iti |
SA16n1278:3873: sarve dharmā sahetusapratyayā api kramaśo jāyante |
SA16n1278:3875: evaṃ prajñāsamādhyādayo dharmāḥ kṣaṇikā api avaramadhyottamadharmakrameṇa jāyante |
SA16n1278:3877: yathā pakṣacchadasyoṣmaṇi mṛdunyapi aṇḍaṃ kramaśo vikriyate |
SA16n1278:3889: yathā bahubhiḥ puṣpairekasmin samaye tilaṃ vāsayati na yathā puṣpālpāni kramaśaściraṃ vāsayanti |
SA16n1278:3890: medasā paripuṣṭiḥ jale [naukā] nimajjanaṃ bhittinirmāṇaṃ ityādirapi tathā |
SA16n1278:3894: bālakādīnāṃ śarīraṃ stanyapānādinā paripacyata itīdamapi tathā syāt |
SA16n1278:3895: ato jñāyate dharmabhāvanā sūkṣmā praṇītā duravabodhā ceti |
SA16n1278:3904: yathoktaṃ sūtre-yaḥ kuśaladharmeṣu na bhāvanāyogamanuyuktaḥ kuśaladharmānanupādāya kevalaṃ praṇidadhāti āsravebhyaścittavimokam |
SA16n1278:3913: kintu pariśuddhatailaṃ pariśuddhavartikāñcobhayamapekṣya [anya] vastusaṃsparśacāñcalyarāhitye ca tatprakāśaḥ pariśuddho bhavati |
SA16n1278:3916: nāpi ca praṇidhānamātrāt deho rūpaṃ balañca labhate |
SA16n1278:3920: ko jñānī hetoḥ phalaṃ jāyata iti prajānan taddhetumupekṣya anyasmātphalamākāṃkṣeta |
SA16n1278:3921: dharma bhāvayan dṛṣṭa eva phalavipākaṃ paśyati |
SA16n1278:3922: yathoktaṃ sūtre-tiṣṭhantu saptadināni mayā śāsitāḥ śrāvakā muhūrtaṃ tāvatkuśaladharmaṃ bhāvayanto'pramāṇavarṣeṣu nityaṃ sukhāṃ vedanāṃ spṛśanti iti |
SA16n1278:3923: bhikṣuṇyo bhadantamānandamavocan-vayaṃ smṛtyupasthāneṣu supratiṣṭhitacittā viharantyaḥ pūrveṇāparaṃ viśeṣaṃ samprajānīma iti |
SA16n1278:3924: sūtre ca bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantryāha- aśaṭhasya māmupasaṅkramato yanmayā prātarupadiṣṭo dharmaḥ tadartha sāyaṃ vindate |
SA16n1278:3925: yat sāyamupadiṣṭo dharmaḥ prātastaddhitaṃ vindata iti |
SA16n1278:3926: yaccārhanmārgaṃ spṛśati na tat parapudgalaḥ prayacchati |
SA16n1278:3929: anuttaraṃ buddhamārga eva nanu kuśaladharmasyopacitabhāvanayā spṛśati |
SA16n1278:3930: yathoktaṃ sūtre-bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantryāha-dvau dharmau niśrityāhamanuttaraṃ mārgaṃ samāpannaḥ yat śubhābhiratāvanirvedo mārgabhāvanāyāmaklāntiśca iti |
SA16n1278:3945: yogī sucaritacaryāyā asti phalavipāka ityanusmṛtya alabhamāno'pi na viṣādaṃ karoti |
SA16n1278:3946: kiñca yogī manasi kuryāt-mayā bhāvanāyāḥ phalavipāko'nuprāpta eva |
SA16n1278:3952: ahaṃ mārgasamāpattipratyayasampannaḥ yat manuṣyadehaprāptiravikalendriyatā puṇyapāpavijñātṛtā vimuktāvapi cādhimuktatā abhyāgatasambuddhitā ityetaiḥ pratyayaiḥ samanvitaḥ kathaṃ na bhāvanāphalavipākamanuprāpsye |
SA16n1278:3955: kleśānāṃ prahāṇamatisūkṣmaṃ dūravabodhaṃ vāśījaṭāyāṃ kramaśaḥ kṣayavat |
SA16n1278:3958: ato jñāyate kuśalaṃ bhāvayituṃ vīryamuttamaṃ bhavatīti |
SA16n1278:3959: alpīyasī prajñā'pi kleśān vināśayati yathā alpīyān prakāśo'ndhakāramapanayati |
SA16n1278:3966: yogī samanucintayet samādhisamāpattiratikṛcchrā yathā purā bodhisattvaḥ puṇyena prajñayā ca ghaniṣṭhaḥ ṣaṭvarṣāṇi vyavasyan ante'nuprāptaḥ |
SA16n1278:3981: sadā kuśalasya bhāvayitā dṛṣṭa eva kāyena āsravāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ spṛśet |
SA16n1278:3982: yadi vā maraṇakāle spṛśet yadi vā āyuṣo'nte susthāna upapadya tadantarā spṛśet |
SA16n1278:3984: yogī adhyātmaṃ cittaṃ vīralakṣaṇaṃ puraskṛtyaivaṃ cintayati ahaṃ kleśāvaraṇamaparyādāya na kadācidvṛthā pratinivarta iti |
SA16n1278:3985: kiñca yogī mānacittamāśrityaivaṃ cintayati-śraddhādīni kuśalendriyāṇi santīti anye samādhiṃ pratipadyante |
SA16n1278:3988: yathā purā bodhisattvaḥ arāḍādibhyo munibhyo dharmaṃ śrutvaivamacintayat ime śraddhādikuśalendriyatvāt dharmamanuprāpnuvan |
SA16n1278:3992: yathoktaṃ-bhikṣuḥ ṣaḍbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato mukhamārutena himavantaṃ [parvatarājamapi] pradalayet |
SA16n1278:3994: kiñca yogī cintayati-ahaṃ pūrvādhvani na samādhiṃ bhāvitavān |
SA16n1278:4000: api ca yogī cintayati-yadyahaṃ sadā vīryamārabhe yadi cānanuprāptamanuprāpnomi |
SA16n1278:4009: prajñāptau prajñeti saṃjñā na tu jñānam |
SA16n1278:4012: āryaśrāvakāḥ prajñāsinā saṃyojanānubaddhān anuśayaparyavanaddhān sarvān kleśān samucchedayati |
SA16n1278:4020: yathoktaṃ sūtra-anityasaṃjñā bhāvitā [bahulīkṛtā] sarvaṃ kāmarāgaṃ paryādāti |
SA16n1278:4024: prajñayā yaḥ kleśānāṃ samucchedaḥ [sa eva] saṃjñayetyucyate |
SA16n1278:4027: ayaṃ maitrīdharmaḥ paramārthato na saṃyojanaṃ samucchedayati |
SA16n1278:4030: ato jñāyate maitrī saṃyojanaṃ samucchedayatīti saṃjñāvacanam |
SA16n1278:4033: yat anityaṃ rūpaṃ anityamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
SA16n1278:4043: tattvajñānameva kleśān samucchedayatītyataḥ prajñaiva tattva[jñāna]miti jñāyate |
SA16n1278:4045: yogī paśyati vai loke sarve devāśca mānuṣāḥ |
SA16n1278:4047: laukikā bhūyasā tucchakaṃ nityaṃ sukhaṃ subhamityādi dṛṣṭvā tattvajñānādbhaṣṭā bhavanti |
SA16n1278:4051: āha ca bhagavān sūtre-yasya dhanaṃ vinaṣṭhaṃ,
SA16n1278:4063: āha ca-[bodhipakṣika] dharmeṣu prajñā agrā iti |
SA16n1278:4067: ato jñāyate prajñā vastutaḥ paramārthālambanā bhavatīti |
SA16n1278:4083: ato laukikaṃ cittaṃ prajñaptimātramālambate na tattvamiti bhavadvacanamayuktam |
SA16n1278:4086: kiñcāha bhagavān-dve samyak dṛṣṭī laukikī lokottareti |
SA16n1278:4087: puṇyapāpādyastitva [samyak dṛṣṭi]laukikī yadāryaśrāvakāṇāṃ duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgānālambya anāsravasmṛtyā samprayuktā prajñā lokottarā |
SA16n1278:4090: adhvanāṃ śatasāhasraṃ na yāvaddurgatau gataḥ || iti |
SA16n1278:4098: āha ca bhagavān-trividhā prajñā śrutamayī prajñā,
SA16n1278:4105: āha ca pañcadharmā aparipavkaṃ vimukticittaṃ vipācayanti iti |
SA16n1278:4120: (pṛ) yo dharmo bhave pātakaḥ sa sāsravaḥ |
SA16n1278:4131: sarvapṛthagjanacittaṃ prajñaptiṃ na paryādātītyataḥ sadā asmitālakṣaṇamanudhāvati |
SA16n1278:4136: ato jñāyate sarvaṃ laukikaṃ cittaṃ prajñaptimavalambata iti |
SA16n1278:4137: yaduktaṃ bhavatā-laukikī prajñā yaduta dvidhā samyagdṛṣṭirityādi iti |
SA16n1278:4142: yat pūrvānte'jñānamaparānte'jñānaṃ pūrvāntāparāntājñānaṃ karmaṇyajñānaṃ karmavipāke'jñānaṃ pūrvāparakarmavipākājñānaṃ ityādi tatra tatra yathābhūtasyājñānamadarśanamanabhisamayaḥ tamaḥ saṃmohaḥ [avidyā]ndhakāraḥ iyamucyate'vidyā iti |
SA16n1278:4144: idaṃ pṛthagjanacittaṃ sadā prajñaptigataṃ sat prajñaptimavalambate |
SA16n1278:4147: idānīṃ yadi sarvaṃ laukikaṃ jñānaṃ prajñaptimavalambate |
SA16n1278:4163: pṛthagjanā yadvadanti ghaṭa iti pudgala iti |
SA16n1278:4165: śaikṣā ātmadṛṣṭivihīnā api samyaksmṛtipramoṣat pañcasu skandheṣu asmimānalakṣaṇena vadanti-ayaṃ pudgalaḥ ayaṃ ghaṭa iti |
SA16n1278:4168: yathā mahākāśyapaḥ saṅghāṭiṃ dṛṣṭvā āha-iyaṃ mameti [yat] divyarddhau vicikitsāṃ janayati |
SA16n1278:4173: dve samyagdṛṣṭī ityādī sūtraṃ kathaṃ neyam |
SA16n1278:4175: bhagavān dharmāṇāṃ tattvalakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī vineyasattvānanusṛtya vividhaṃ nāma sthāpayati |
SA16n1278:4178: api cāha anityādisaṃjñā bhāvitā sarvān kleśān paribhedayatīti |
SA16n1278:4179: āha ca-caturthamakṛṣṇamaśuklaṃ karma sarvakarmāṇi śaikṣacetanākhyāni kṣapayatīti |
SA16n1278:4189: vaktavyā ca dvividhā saṃjñā lokaṃ pratītya satyaṃ,
SA16n1278:4193: kācit mohakāṣṭhātmikā saṃjñā yāvat laukikakuśalākuśalāni na vijānāti |
SA16n1278:4197: itīyaṃ saṃjñā skandhalakṣaṇaparibhedakaṃ jñānamanukūlayatītyato bhagavānupadiśati jñānamiti |
SA16n1278:4198: iyañca saṃjñā tattvajñānasya hetuṃ karotītyato jñānami tyucyate |
SA16n1278:4205: saptāsravasūtre ca vacanaprahāṇavṛttiprahāṇādaya āsravahetava āsravā ityucyante |
SA16n1278:4212: (pṛ) smṛtyupasthāneṣu uṣmādiṣu ca gataṃ cittaṃ tattvadharmamālambate |
SA16n1278:4215: ato yatra prajñaptividhamanaṃ cittaṃ tadanu samāgataṃ cittamanāsravaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1278:4221: anātmasaṃjñayā cittaṃ bhāvayatāṃ kṣipraṃ rāgadveṣamohebhyo vimucyate ityādi |
SA16n1278:4223: anātmasaṃjñayā hi cittaṃ bhāvayatāṃ duḥkhasaṃjñā pratitiṣṭhati |
SA16n1278:4233: (u) sūtra uktam-anityasaṃjñābhāvitaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ cittamanātmasaṃjñāyāṃ pratitiṣṭhati iti |
SA16n1278:4238: ataḥ pañcaskandhā anityā iti paśyan anātmāna iti prajānāti |
SA16n1278:4243: ātmā ma utpadyate vyeti cetyasyāgataṃ bhavati | iti |
SA16n1278:4261: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā vāśījaṭopamasūtre-jānataḥ paśyata āsravāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ vadāmi |
SA16n1278:4262: kiṃ jānataḥ kiṃ paśyata āsravāṇāṃ kṣayo bhavati |
SA16n1278:4269: evameva bhāvanānuyogamanuyuktasya bhikṣornaivaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati etāvatko bata me'dyāsravāṇāṃ kṣīṇam |
SA16n1278:4271: atha khalvasya kṣīṇe kṣīṇānta eva jñānaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1278:4276: ato jñāyate smṛtyupasthānādigato mārgāṅgabhāvanānuyogamanuktaḥ strotaāpattiphalapratipannaka iti |
SA16n1278:4277: yadyekasmin kṣaṇe yadi vā pañcadaśasu kṣaṇeṣu na bhāvanānuyogaṃ vindate |
SA16n1278:4281: iti vedanā iti jñānamiti prathamamuktamādyaphalasya mārgaḥ |
SA16n1278:4291: ataḥ smṛtyupasthānādau pūtibhūtaḥ san pṛthagjano bhavati |
SA16n1278:4295: ato jñāyate smṛtyupasthānādigataḥ viprakṛṣṭaḥ pratipannaka ityucyate |
SA16n1278:4296: kiñcogreṇa saṅghe nimantrite devatā upasaṅkramya ārocayanti-amuko gṛhapate arhan yāvadamuka ādyaphalapratipannaka iti |
SA16n1278:4300: kiñcoktaṃ bhagavatā sūtre-yasya [khalu bhikṣava imāni] pañcendriyāṇi (śraddhādīni) na santi |
SA16n1278:4301: tamahaṃ bāhyaḥ pṛthagjanapakṣe sthita iti vadāmīti |
SA16n1278:4306: ayamābhyantaraḥ pṛthagjana ārya ityupyucyate pṛthagjana ityapyucyate |
SA16n1278:4315: atha ca [tatra] channasya [cittaṃ] na dharmaniyāme praskandati |
SA16n1278:4320: (u) yo nirodhaṃ paśyati sa tattvataḥ pratipannakaḥ |
SA16n1278:4321: yo dūrabhāgīyakuśalendriyagataḥ paśyati pañcaskandhā anityāḥ duḥkhā śūnyā anātmāna iti |
SA16n1278:4325: yathoktaṃ sūtre-bhikṣavo bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti-kathaṃ dharmaṃ paśyema iti |
SA16n1278:4327: tatsahabhuvo vedanāsaṃjñā cetanādayaḥ sarve [dharmā] anityā vipariṇāmadharmāṇaḥ aśraddheyāḥ |
SA16n1278:4337: yoginaścitta evaṃ bhavati-idaṃ praṇītamupaśamapadaṃ yat sarveṣāṃ mṛṣābhūtānāṃ kāmatṛṣṇānāmapagamaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇam |
SA16n1278:4338: yadasmin dharme cittaṃ praskandati adhimucyate neñjate na parāvartate na śocate na paritrāsate |
SA16n1278:4340: ato jñāyate yogī anityādyākāraiḥ pañcaskandhānavalokayan viprakṛṣṭaḥ pratipannaka ityucyate |
SA16n1278:4341: teṣāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyan sannikṛṣṭaḥ pratipannaka iti |
SA16n1278:4342: yathā channaḥ sthavirān prativadati-mamāpyevaṃ bhavati-rūpamanityaṃ [vijñānamanityaṃ rūpamanātmā,
SA16n1278:4346: atha ca punarme] sarvasaṃskārasamarthe tṛṣṇākṣaye nirodhe nirvāṇe cittaṃ na praskandati,
SA16n1278:4352: na khalvimaṃ dharmaṃ paśyato bhavati | iti |
SA16n1278:4353: kiñcāha-yogī yadasmin dharme mṛduprajñayā kṣāntiṃ śraddadhate sa śraddhā[nusārī] pratipannakaḥ |
SA16n1278:4355: yastīkṣṇaprajñayā kṣāntiṃ śraddadhate sa dharmā[nusārī] pratipannakaḥ |
SA16n1278:4358: ato jñāyate nirodhaṃ paśyan sannikṛṣṭaḥ pratipannako bhavatīti |
SA16n1278:4364: bhagavān dvādaśanidānānāṃ nirodhaṃ dṛṣṭvā anuttaramabhisambuddho'bhūt iti |
SA16n1278:4365: dharmamudrāyāñcoktam-pañcaskandhānanityān vipralopān mṛṣābhūtānasārān śūnyāṃśca paśyato yogino jñānadarśanamaviśuddhaṃ bhavati iti |
SA16n1278:4366: sūtramidamanta āha-yogina evaṃ bhavati-yanmayā dṛśyate śrūyate ājighryate rasyate spṛśyate manyate tat sarvaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ vijñānam |
SA16n1278:4367: yadasya vijñānasya hetupratyayā nityā vā anityā vā iti |
SA16n1278:4369: anityebhyo hetupratyayebhya utpannaṃ vijñānaṃ kathaṃ nityaṃ bhavet |
SA16n1278:4370: ataḥ sarve pañcaskandhā anityāḥ pratītyasamutpannāḥ kṣayalakṣaṇāḥ vipariṇāmalakṣaṇā viyogalakṣaṇā nirodhalakṣaṇā iti paśyati |
SA16n1278:4381: sūtre hi bhagavatoktam-caturṇāmaryasatyānāṃ yathābhūtamananubodhāt evamidaṃ dīrghamadhvānaṃ [sandhāvitaṃ] saṃsaritaṃ mama ca yuṣmākañca idānīmimāni catvāri satyānyanubaddhāni |
SA16n1278:4389: āha ca-ye hi kecit dharmakañcukā ninditakāyāḥ samyakpravrajyāṃ śraddadhante |
SA16n1278:4391: ye hi kecit strotaāpattiṃ sakṛdāgāmitāmanāgāmitāñca lipsanti |
SA16n1278:4393: ye hi kecit arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhatāṃ buddhamārgañca lipsanti |
SA16n1278:4397: dharmacakrapravartane coktam-idaṃ duḥkhamayaṃ duḥkhasamudayaḥ ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipaditi paśyato mama teṣu cakṣurudapadyata jñānamudapadyata vidyodapadyata bodhirudapadyata iti,
SA16n1278:4399: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre-avadātavasane hrade prakṣipte sati rūpaṃ [yathā] vedayate |
SA16n1278:4400: evamayaṃ puruṣa ekatra niṣaṇṇaścatvāri satyāni paśyati iti |
SA16n1278:4402: evaṃ paśyataḥ kāmāsravāt bhavāsravādavidyāsravāt cittaṃ vimucyate |
SA16n1278:4407: bhagavānāha catvāri jñānāni duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayajñānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānamiti |
SA16n1278:4410: yathā bhiṣak rogaṃ jñātvā roganidānaṃ rogavināśaṃ rogavināśauṣadhañca jānīyāt |
SA16n1278:4411: evaṃ yogī duḥkhānāṃ nissaraṇamicchan duḥkhaṃ duḥkhanidānaṃ duḥkhanirodhaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminīṃ pratipadañca jānīyāt |
SA16n1278:4412: yadi na jānāti duḥkhaṃ kena jñāsyati duḥkhanidānaṃ duḥkhanirodhaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminīṃ pratipadañca |
SA16n1278:4415: sarvaṃ [tat] skandhadhātvāyatanādiṣūktam-yadidaṃ rūpaṃ ityādi ayaṃ rūpasya samudaya ityādi ayaṃ rūpasya vyaya ityādi prajānata āsravāḥ kṣīyanta iti |
SA16n1278:4416: kiñcāha bhagavān-rūpādīnāṃ skandhānāṃ yathābhūtamāsvādamādīnavaṃ nissaraṇaptaprajñāyānuttaraṃ mārgamaspṛśamiti na vadāmi |
SA16n1278:4418: nagaropamasūtre coktam-yadā mama na jñānamabhūt-[iti] jarāmaraṇaṃ jarāmaraṇasamudayo jarāmaraṇanirodho jarāmaraṇanirodhagāminī pratipat |
SA16n1278:4419: yāvat saṃskārāḥ saṃskārasamudayaḥ saṃskāranirodhaḥ saṃskāranirodhagāminī pratipat iti |
SA16n1278:4422: evamādi [vacanāni] dṛṣṭvā yadi [vadāmaḥ] ayameva darśanamārgādhigama iti |
SA16n1278:4428: tathā no cet nidānaṃ vaktavyaṃ-catussatyadarśanaṃ mārgādhigamakālīnaṃ pañcaskandhādidarśanaṃ sammarśanakālīnamiti |
SA16n1278:4430: pañcaskandhādīnāṃ sammarśanaṃ na kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya bhavati |
SA16n1278:4438: kecit dvādaśāyatanāni vā aṣṭādaśadhātūn vā dvādaśanidānāni vā anyāni vā paśyanto mārgamadhigacchanti iti |
SA16n1278:4439: ato jñāyate na catussatya[darśana]mātreṇa mārgādhima iti |
SA16n1278:4440: yadi bhavato mataṃ satyapyasmin vacane naitaddarśanena kleśān prajahātīti |
SA16n1278:4443: catussatyavibhaṅga uktam-jātirapi duḥkhaṃ jarāpi duḥkhaṃ vyādhirapi duḥkhaṃ maraṇamapi duḥkhaṃ vipriyasaṃyogo duḥkhaṃ priyaviyogo duḥkhaṃ yadiṣṭaṃ na labhyate tadapi duḥkhaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkhamiti |
SA16n1278:4444: kiñcāha duḥkhasamudayo yeyaṃ tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī tatra tatrābhinandinī iti |
SA16n1278:4446: idaṃ sarvaṃ lokasatyaṃ na tu paramārthasatyam |
SA16n1278:4452: pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkhamiti paśyataścittameva vikṣipyate na mārgo'dhigamyate |
SA16n1278:4459: ato jñāyate yogī cittata eva saṃskṛtadharme vartate na paramārthata iti |
SA16n1278:4460: yathoktaṃ sūtre-saṃskṛtadharmā anṛtā māyopamā jvālopamā svapnopamā ṛṇopamā iti |
SA16n1278:4463: asat dṛṣṭaṃ sadābhāsaṃ asadvai parayā dhiyā || iti |
SA16n1278:4464: strī puruṣa iti dharmo yathābhūtaṃ nāsti |
SA16n1278:4465: pañcaskandhānāṃ kalāpamātre strī puruṣa iti sudṛḍhaṃ kīrtayantaḥ pṛthagjanā viparyayamugdhā vadanti |
SA16n1278:4468: yogī tu ime pañcaskandhāḥ śūnyā anātmāna iti bhāvayati |
SA16n1278:4470: yathoktaṃ dharmamudrāsūtre-yogī bhāvayati rūpamanityaṃ śūnyaṃ viyogalakṣaṇamiti |
SA16n1278:4473: śūnyamiti yathā ghaṭe jale'sati śūnyo ghaṭa iti vadanti |
SA16n1278:4474: evaṃ pañcaskandheṣu nāstyātmā ityataḥ śūnyā bhavanti |
SA16n1278:4477: ante tu nirodhaṃ paśyati yaduta yogina evaṃ bhavati yanmayā dṛṣṭaṃ śrutamityādi |
SA16n1278:4478: ato jñāyate nirodhaṃ paśyata eva kleśāḥ kṣīyanta iti |
SA16n1278:4481: nirodhalakṣaṇasākṣātkurvatastu saṃskṛteṣu duḥkhasaṃjñā na vyavasthitā bhavati |
SA16n1278:4482: yathā kasyacit prathamadhyāne prītisukhamalabdhavato na pañcakāmaguṇeṣu nirvedasaṃjñā jāyate |
SA16n1278:4483: yathā ca avitarkāvicārasamādhimalabdhvā na savitarkasavicārasamādhau doṣaṃ manyate |
SA16n1278:4485: ato jñātavyaṃ nirodhasatyaṃ paśyata eva duḥkhasaṃjñā sampannā bhavati |
SA16n1278:4495: yathoktaṃ sūtre-yogī [yat] samudayalakṣaṇaṃ tat nirodhalakṣaṇamiti prajānan suviśuddhaṃ dharmacakṣuranuprāpnoti |
SA16n1278:4498: skandhā anityā duḥkhā iti paśyannapi na nirodhamanuprāpnoti |
SA16n1278:4501: kasmāt bhagavān pudgalaḥ sukumāramatirityādi dṛṣṭvā catussatyānyudeśayati,
SA16n1278:4507: (pṛ) mārgalābhasamaya eva yadi satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ prahīyata iti |
SA16n1278:4509: (u) yogī mārgamanuprāpya dharmāḥ śūnyā anātmāna iti dṛṣṭataḥ paśyan na punarvicikitsate |
SA16n1278:4511: mārgasatyaṃ paśyan prajānāti idamekameva tattvaṃ nānyadastīti |
SA16n1278:4513: (pṛ) yadi mārgalābhakāla eva satyadarśanapraheyāḥ kleśāḥ kṣīyante |
SA16n1278:4516: yathā bhagavān bhīkṣūn pṛcchati-kena vastunā kiṃ vastūpādāya kiṃ vastvabhiniviśya īdṛśī dṛṣṭirbhavati |
SA16n1278:4517: asmin kāye mriyamāṇa eva īdṛśādayaḥ sarvā dṛṣṭayo nirudhyante |
SA16n1278:4518: bhikṣava āhuḥ-bhagavanmūlā hi no bhagavan dharmāḥ |
SA16n1278:4520: bhagavānāha-rūpe khalu sati rūpamupādāya rūpamabhiniviśya saktāyadṛṣṭirbhavati |
SA16n1278:4522: ato jñātavyaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭimupādāya sarve kleśāḥ sambhavantīti |
SA16n1278:4524: satyāṃ hi satkāyadṛṣṭau vadanti-ayamātmā nityo vā'nityo veti |
SA16n1278:4545: dharmalakṣaṇaṃ sākṣātkurvato yogino na vicikitsā bhavati |
SA16n1278:4551: śīlavratasamucchedāt mārgaṃ prayujya jñāne jñeyadharmeṣu ca na vicikitsate |
SA16n1278:4553: sa eva samudayaṃ prahāya nirodhamadhigacchan catussatyasampanna ityucyate |
SA16n1278:4554: ata eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ vacanameva nirvicikitsālakṣaṇaṃ pradarśayati |
SA16n1278:4556: yathoktaṃ sūtre-ādyābhisambodhilakṣaṇaṃ yaduta dharmaṃ paśyati dharmaṃ pratilabhate dharmaṃ prajānāti dharmaṃ pratisaṃvedayate |
SA16n1278:4558: bhagavacchāsane ca vaiśāradyabalamanuprāpya phale supratitiṣṭhati | iti ||
SA16n1278:4564: āyataneṣu dhātuṣu cokteṣu padārthā ālambanāni viṣayā jñeyā ityādayaḥ sarve dharmā bhavanti |
SA16n1278:4573: (pṛ) uktaṃ hi sūtre-dvābhyāṃ pratyayābhyāṃ vijñānamutpadyata iti |
SA16n1278:4582: kiñcit ṣaṣṭhasya vijñānasya svakalāpe sarvathā asadālambanaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1278:4595: na vastutaḥ sparśasya ṣaḍāyatanāni pratyayā bhavanti |
SA16n1278:4598: evaṃ caturaḥ pratyayān pratiṣidhyāha bhagavān dve āyatane iti |
SA16n1278:4602: (pṛ) anenaiva hetunā atītānāgatādayoḥ dharmāḥ santaḥ syuḥ |
SA16n1278:4613: yo dharma utpadya niruddhaḥ sa smaraṇīyaḥ |
SA16n1278:4615: kiṃ smaryeta yathā dharmaḥ pūrvaṃ sattvākhya idānīmatīto'pi sattvākhyaḥ |
SA16n1278:4616: evaṃ tasmin dharme pūrvaṃ smṛtyutpādāt tadeva cittaṃ punaḥ smaryate |
SA16n1278:4619: tasmin dharme niruddhe'pi tatsaṃjñānusmaraṇamutpādya [taṃ dharmaṃ] vikalpayati |
SA16n1278:4620: yo dharmastasya citte jāyate sa dharmo vinaṣṭaḥ |
SA16n1278:4621: paścāt [ta]nmanovijñānaṃ tat vastu vijānāti ida[meva] nimittālambanaṃ vijñānamityākhyayate |
SA16n1278:4633: yathā āryā anāgataṃ vastu jñātvā vadanti-idaṃ vastu tathā syāt,
SA16n1278:4635: (u) āryajñānabalaṃ hi tathā dharmamasantamapi prāk prajānāti |
SA16n1278:4636: yathā āryāḥ pāṣaṇabhittiṃ bhittvā apratihatamunmajjanti nimajjanti ca |
SA16n1278:4639: yathā cakṣurvijñānaṃ na strīti puruṣa iti vā vikalpayati |
SA16n1278:4646: yathā devadatta iti vacane naikaṃ vijñānaṃ catvāryakṣarāṇi vijānāti |
SA16n1278:4650: yathā ca puruṣasya svarūpaṃ naikakṣaṇena parijñeyamam |
SA16n1278:4654: bhavānavādīḥ-dṛṣṭāntaṃ pratītya nāsti kiñcit svātmālambanaṃ jñānamiti |
SA16n1278:4656: yogī cittavipaśyanāmanusarati atīte'nāgate tu cittaṃ nāsti iti vacanāt |
SA16n1278:4658: no cet na jātu kaścitpratyutpannacittasamprayukta dharmaṃ vijānāti |
SA16n1278:4660: sarve dharmā anātmānaḥ prajñayā yadi paśyati |
SA16n1278:4661: atha nirvindate duḥkhe eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye || iti |
SA16n1278:4662: iyaṃ prajñā ātmānaṃ sahabhūdharmānanyāni sarvadharmālambanāni cāpanayati |
SA16n1278:4666: tasyāṃ hi gāthāyāmuktam-atha nirvindate duḥkha iti |
SA16n1278:4684: uktañca sūtre-yatkiñcit [bhikṣavo] rūpamatītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannamādhyātmikaṃ vā bahirdhā vā audārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā [hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā] yaddūre'ntike vā sarvaṃ jānāti nātmā nātmīyamiti |
SA16n1278:4685: evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā paśyati iti |
SA16n1278:4690: rūpamanityaṃ tucchaṃ māyāvat bālālāpanaṃ vadhakaṃ steyakamanātmā anātmīyamiti |
SA16n1278:4691: kiñcāha bhagavān-atra niṣaṇṇaḥ kaścinmūḍho'vidyāṇḍagato'vidyāndhībhūtaḥ parityajya buddhaśāsanamimāṃ mithyādṛṣṭimutpādayati-yadi rūpaṃ nātmā,
SA16n1278:4696: kathamanātmā karma kṛtvā ātmanā anubhavati iti |
SA16n1278:4698: sūtre ca anātmajñānaṃ sarvadharmanālambata iti vacanasthānaṃ na kiñcanāsti |
SA16n1278:4709: sarve dharmā anātmāna ityuktatvāt jñātavyaṃ yat saṃskārā iti vacanaṃ tat saṃskṛtābhidhāyakam |
SA16n1278:4710: yat dharmā iti vacanaṃ tat sarvā[bhidhāyaka]miti |
SA16n1278:4711: āha ca-ka ekalakṣaṇadharmaṃ lakṣaṇāntaradharmañcābhimukhaṃ samprajānāti yathā vidyācakṣuṣā rūpaṃ paśyati |
SA16n1278:4712: kevalaṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ samyak sambuddhā vimuktilābhina ekalakṣaṇadharmaṃ lakṣaṇāntaradharmañcābhimukhaṃ samprajānanti yathā vidyācakṣuṣā rūpaṃ paśyanti iti |
SA16n1278:4721: yathā ca tathāgatavarge uktam-tathāgataḥ sarvatyāgī sarvajayī iti |
SA16n1278:4731: bhikṣurayaṃ sāmānyena sarve dharmā anityā iti prajānātītyataḥ sarvajño bhavati |
SA16n1278:4755: ato jñāyate sarvamanātmeti vacane satyapi pañcopādānaskandhāna[bhisandhāya] uktaṃ,
SA16n1278:4764: (pṛ) laukikī śūnyatā sarvadharmānālambate na tu anāsravaśūnyatā |
SA16n1278:4768: (u) iyaṃ lokottaraśūnyatā na tu laukikī śūnyatā |
SA16n1278:4769: (pṛ) atroktaṃ jñānadarśanasyāviśuddhatvāt jñāyata iyaṃ laukikī śūnyateti |
SA16n1278:4772: paścānnirodhasatyaṃ dṛṣṭvā abhimānaṃ vihāya jñānadarśanaṃ viśuddhaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1278:4774: yadbhavānāha-sarve saṃskārā anityāḥ sarve dharmā anātmāna iti |
SA16n1278:4775: evaṃ hi syāt-yogī yadā nairātmyasaṃjñāsamanvitaḥ tadā dharmasaṃjñāsamanvitatvāt nairātmye dharma iti sa saṃjñocyate |
SA16n1278:4782: ataḥ sarve dharmā anātmāna iti vacanaṃ duḥkhasatyamātramālambya anātmā saṃskāra ityabhidadhāti |
SA16n1278:4787: asti dvividho vihāraḥ śūnyavihāra anātmavihāra iti |
SA16n1278:4788: pañcaskandheṣu nāsti sattva iti darśanaṃ śūnyavihāraḥ |
SA16n1278:4791: uktaṃ hi sūtre- rūpaṃ niskhabhāvaṃ paśyati [yāvat] vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ niḥskhabhāvaṃ paśyatīti |
SA16n1278:4793: ato jñāyate rūpasvabhāvo na vastusan yāvadvedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānasvabhāvā na vastusanta iti |
SA16n1278:4794: api coktaṃ sūtre-pañcaskandhāḥ śūnyā māyāvat iti |
SA16n1278:4801: ato jñāyate pañcaskandhā na vastusanta iti |
SA16n1278:4810: nirodhaḥ sa niyataṃ yathābhūta ityataḥ paramārthasan iti |
SA16n1278:4811: (pṛ) yadbhavatoktaṃ pañcaskandheṣu nāsti sattva iti darśanaṃ [śūnyavihāra] iti |
SA16n1278:4815: sūtra uktam-yaḥ sattvaṃ paśyati sa pañcopādānaskandhān paśyati iti |
SA16n1278:4817: ato jñāyate anāsravān skandhānupādāyāpi sattva ityucyante |
SA16n1278:4826: yathoktaṃ sūtre-avidyānivṛtatṛṣṇāsaṃyojanayā pratibaddho mūḍha imaṃ kāyamanuprāpnoti |
SA16n1278:4831: (u) sarve skandhā upādānādutpannā ityata upādānaskandhā ityucyante |
SA16n1278:4834: skandhā upādānaskandhaiḥ sahopādānādutpannā ityata upādānaskandhā ityabhidhīyante |
SA16n1278:4840: uktaṃ hi sūtre-rūpaṃ paśyati śūnyamanātmā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārān vijñānañca paśyati śūnyamanātmā iti |
SA16n1278:4848: (u) yogī sattvakāraṇe na sattvaṃ paśyatītyata eva śūnyacittamutpādya tataḥ śūnyaṃ paśyati |
SA16n1278:4849: pañcaskandhānāṃ nirodhe ca na paśyati rūpasvabhāvaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānasvabhāvam |
SA16n1278:4863: pañcavijñānasamprayuktā ca prajñā jñānameva ca darśanam |
SA16n1278:4870: uktañca sūtre-yat dharmeṣu dharmān parīttaṃ prajñayā vipaśyati |
SA16n1278:4874: prathamā cānāsravā prajñā prāthamikaṃ darśanaṃ kṣāntiḥ |
SA16n1278:4883: yogī pūrvaṃ duḥkhaṃ jñātvā paścāt [tat-] kṣāntāvabhiramate |
SA16n1278:4886: parīttavacane ca kevalamuktaṃ vipaśyanā kṣāntiriti na jñānam |
SA16n1278:4888: yadi manyase yogino jñānavata eva kṣāntirbhavatīti |
SA16n1278:4890: uktañca sūtre-[evaṃ] jānan paśyan āsravādvimucyata iti |
SA16n1278:4892: kiñca bhagavānāha-duḥkhajñānaṃ samudaya[jñānaṃ] nirodha[jñānaṃ] mārgajñānam iti |
SA16n1278:4899: na vayaṃ vadāmaḥ pūrvaṃ kṣāntiḥ paścāt jñānamiti |
SA16n1278:4914: na savikalpikeyaṃ kṣāntiḥ idaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1278:4915: yathā laukikī vipaśyanā catussatyānusāriṇī kṣāntirityapyucyate jñānamityapyucyate |
SA16n1278:4919: (pṛ) sūtre hi pṛthugucyate samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyak jñānamiti |
SA16n1278:4921: (u) tathā cet samyagdṛṣṭirna samyag jñānaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1278:4922: yadi bhavato mataṃ samyag dṛṣṭiḥ samyag jñānamiti |
SA16n1278:4924: pañcāṅgadharmakāye prajñāskandhāt pṛthaguktaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaṃ na prajñā bhavet |
SA16n1278:4925: tathā ca kṣayajñānamamutpādajñānamapi na prajñā bhavati |
SA16n1278:4927: yaduta sarvakleśānāṃ kṣayo'rhataścitte samutpadyata ityata [stata] samyag jñānamityucyate |
SA16n1278:4947: prathamata ālambanagatatvāt na dṛṣṭiriti yadi matam |
SA16n1278:4950: bhavatāṃ hi śāsanaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ santānālambanaṃ yathā manovijñānamiti |
SA16n1278:4960: dṛṣṭiḥ jñānaṃ prajñā ityādi sarvaṃ nāsti |
SA16n1278:4967: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ-santyaṣṭadṛṣṭayo yaduta pañcamithyādṛṣṭayo laukikī samyagdṛṣṭiḥ śaikṣadṛṣṭiraśaikṣadṛṣṭiḥ |
SA16n1278:4968: etā aṣṭadṛṣṭirvarjayitvā anyā prajñā na dṛṣṭirityucyata iti |
SA16n1278:4970: (u) jñānadarśanaṃ vimuktilābhaḥ pratisaṃvedanaṃ sākṣātkāra itīdaṃ sarvamekārthakam |
SA16n1278:4971: iyaṃ dṛṣṭiriyaṃ na dṛṣṭiriti yat vacanam |
SA16n1278:4973: (pṛ) uktaṃ nanu sūtre-jānan paśyan āsravādvimucyata iti |
SA16n1278:4975: (u) yat jñātvā ādau prajñaptiṃ vidārayati tat jñānamityucyate |
SA16n1278:4988: yathoktaṃ sūtre-rāhulo bhikṣurvimuktiprāpiṇīṃ prajñāṃ sampādayati iti |
SA16n1278:4989: vedādīn vyāvahārikagranthān śṛṇvannapi nānāsravāṃ prajñāmutpādayatītyato na [sā] śrutamayī prajñā bhavati |
SA16n1278:4990: yat sūtrāṇāmarthaṃ cintayati sā cintāmayī prajñā |
SA16n1278:4993: api cāha-yogī dharmaṃ śrutvā tadarthaṃ cintayan sadā pratipadamanuvartata iti |
SA16n1278:4996: yathoktaṃ sūtre-yūyaṃ bhikṣavo dhyānasamādhiṃ bhāvayanto yathābhūtajñānadarśanamabhimukhaṃ labhadhve |
SA16n1278:5042: api coktaṃ sūtre-bhagavān dharmamupadiśati ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇamante kalyāṇamityādi |
SA16n1278:5043: taṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇoti satpuruṣastaruṇo vṛddho vā |
SA16n1278:5046: tadaiva bhogaskandhaṃ prahāya jñātiparivṛttaṃ prahāya agārādanāgāraṃ pravrajati |
SA16n1278:5054: tatra yat dharmaṃ śṛṇoti taruṇo vā vṛddho vā iti |
SA16n1278:5069: tatra niṣevya santaṃ puruṣaṃ saddharmamupaśrutya cetīyaṃ śrutamayī prajñā |
SA16n1278:5077: evamādinā tatra tatra sutre bhagavān trividhāṃ prajñāmavocat |
SA16n1278:5082: yathā hastaka upāsako'tapyaddeveṣūpapadya tatra dharmaṃ deśayati |
SA16n1278:5089: (u) kena pratyayena kāmadhātau nāsti bhāvanāmayī prajñā |
SA16n1278:5090: (pṛ) na kāmadhātukamārgeṇa sarvāṇi nīvaraṇāni sarvāṇi paryavasthānāni prajahāti yena kāmadhātukaparyavasthānaṃ nābhimukhībhavet |
SA16n1278:5091: (u) bhavatāṃ śāsane nedaṃ vacanamasti yat na kāmadhātukamārgeṇa nīvaraṇāni paryavasthānāni prajahāti yena kāmadhātukaparyavasthānaṃ nābhimukhībhavediti |
SA16n1278:5095: yathoktaṃ sūtre-aśubhabhāvanāṃ bhāvayan kāmarāgaṃ samūhanti iti |
SA16n1278:5101: (u) dauṣṭhulyādinā kleśān prajahāti nāśubhādinā iti nāsti kiñcana sūtravacanam |
SA16n1278:5102: uktaṃ hi sūtre-aśubhādinā kleśān samūhanti iti |
SA16n1278:5107: yadi nāsti, vaktavyaṃ kāraṇaṃ kasmādasti aśubhādiḥ,
SA16n1278:5111: atrāpi kāraṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ kasmāt kāmadhātau na samucchedayati |
SA16n1278:5128: (u) tīrthikāḥ prahīṇasaṃyojanā api punaḥ kāmadhātau samutpadyante |
SA16n1278:5133: api coktaṃ sūtre- kṣīṇatrisaṃyojanastrīṇi viṣāṇi samūhantīti |
SA16n1278:5134: prākṛto na trīṇi saṃyojanāni kṣapayatītyato na vītarāgo bhavati |
SA16n1278:5149: yathoktaṃ sūtre-dvāvimau bhikṣavaḥ aśanyā phalantyā na santrasataḥ |
SA16n1278:5150: [katamau dvau] bhikṣuśca kṣīṇāsravo rājā ca cakravartī iti |
SA16n1278:5160: vastutastu pṛthagjanasya vītarāga iti kathyamānasyāpi nedaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ syāt |
SA16n1278:5166: āha ca arāḍaḥ kalāma udrako rāmaputro rūpe vītarāga ārūpya utpadyata iti |
SA16n1278:5170: ato [yat]bhavatoktaṃ pṛthagjanaḥ kṣīṇakleśo'pi punarutpadyata ityato na kṣīṇa[kleśa] iti |
SA16n1278:5172: bhavānapyāha-pṛthagjanasya sarvāṇi vidyamānāni prahīṇānīti idaṃ vastutaḥ pratiṣiddhamityataḥ kṣīṇo vīta ityucyate |
SA16n1278:5174: ahaṃ mameti yā cintā mriyamāṇo jahāti tām
SA16n1278:5178: yo bālaḥ svabhūmiṃ tyajati taṃ satkṛtavatāmapi nāsti mahāvipākaḥ |
SA16n1278:5182: ato jñāyate pṛthagjano vastutaḥ prahīṇa[kleśo] vīta[rāga] iti |
SA16n1278:5185: yadi satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ vyāvṛttavān tadā pūrvokto doṣaḥ |
SA16n1278:5190: ataḥ pṛthagjano na vastutaḥ prahīṇasaṃyojana iti jñāyate |
SA16n1278:5199: na tatrāsti kāraṇamāsannabhūmiṃ niśrayate na kāmadhātukasamādhimiti |
SA16n1278:5205: kintu dharmasthitijñānamavaśyaṃ pūrvaṃ kṛtvā paścādāsravakṣayo bhavatīti |
SA16n1278:5222: uktañca sūtre-yogī śubhaṃ pratilabhamāno'śubhaṃ tyajati tadyathā nandaḥ apsaratṛṣṇāmupādāya pūrvatanakāmaṃ jahau iti |
SA16n1278:5228: yadyāryaśrāvakaḥ kadācit pañcakāmaguṇā na prītisaumanasyajanakā ityanusmarati |
SA16n1278:5251: yathā sūtre bhagavānāha-bhikṣūṇāṃ cīvaraṃ gṛhṇatāṃ triṣu [kleśa] viṣeṣu satsvapi cīvarāsaṅgo niruddha eveti |
SA16n1278:5265: ataḥ satyadarśanamārge na laukikaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvayati |
SA16n1278:5276: yathoktaṃ sūtre-santi catvāro bhāṣitadharmāḥ kiñcidbhāṣitaṃ sārthagati nākṣayakaram |
SA16n1278:5283: yathāha-santi catvāro bhāṣitadharmāḥ kaścidarthopāyaḥ na vyañjanopāyaḥ |
SA16n1278:5287: ya etaccatuḥpratisaṃvitprāptaḥ sa upāyasampanno duṣpradhṛṣyo duradhigamyo dharmabhāṣaṇe |
SA16n1278:5302: (pṛ) catasra imāḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ kasmin dhātau vartante |
SA16n1278:5315: yathā jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ yāvadavidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti |
SA16n1278:5316: asti vā tathāgato nāsti vā tathāgataḥ |
SA16n1278:5317: eṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ sadā sthita ityato dharmasthitijñānamityucyate |
SA16n1278:5323: yataḥ asti vā tathāgato nāsti vā tathāgataḥ |
SA16n1278:5340: api coktam-santi dvidhaiva dharmāḥ saṃskṛto'saṃskṛta iti |
SA16n1278:5343: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre-ye vidyante saṃskṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā vā nirodho nirvāṇaṃ teṣāmagramākhyāyate iti |
SA16n1278:5350: bhagavān bahudhātukasūtra āha-vidvān saṃskṛtadhātumasaṃskṛtādhātuñca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
SA16n1278:5354: sarveṣu sūtreṣu nāsti kiñcinniyataṃ vacanaṃ nirvāṇamasaddharma iti |
SA16n1278:5355: ato jñāyate yannirvāṇamasaditi tat bhavataḥ svasaṃjñāvikalpa eveti |
SA16n1278:5356: ucyate | yadi skandhānāṃ viyoge'pi punarasti dharmāntaraṃ nirvāṇamiti |
SA16n1278:5363: yathoktaṃ sūtre-yogī rūpalakṣaṇaṃ prahīṇaṃ paśyati yāvaddharmalakṣaṇaṃ prahīṇaṃ paśyati iti |
SA16n1278:5364: sūtre ca tatra tatroktam-sarve dharmā anityāḥ sarve dharmā anātmānaḥ |
SA16n1278:5369: yadi nirvāṇaṃ dharmaḥ tadā nāsti svabhāva iti darśanaṃ nopalabdhuṃ śakyate |
SA16n1278:5373: ghaṭe vinaṣṭe tu ghaṭo vinaṣṭa iti vaktuṃ śakyate |
SA16n1278:5379: yathoktaṃ sūtre-yadidaṃ bhikṣavo duḥkhaṃ nirudhyate anyadduḥkhaṃ notpadyate na punastatsantatirasti |
SA16n1278:5380: idaṃ sthānaṃ paramaṃ śāntaṃ śiva yaduta sarvapratinissargaḥ kāyikacaitasikarāgātyantavisaṃyogo nirodho nirvāṇamiti |
SA16n1278:5382: anyaddaḥkhaṃ notpadyata iti vacane ko dharmo nirvāṇādanyo bhavati |
SA16n1278:5395: tathā no cet cīvarakṣayādirapi pṛthak dharmaḥ syāt |
SA16n1278:5403: yathā yatra yannāsti tatra tena śūnyamiti jñānam |
SA16n1278:5416: yena jñānena na raṇāyate pareṇa saha |
SA16n1278:5429: (pṛ) tathā cet bhagavato buddhasya kevalamidaṃ jñānaṃ syāt |
SA16n1278:5434: yat yogī prakṛṣṭamuttamaṃ jñānaṃ sarvadhyānasamādhibhiḥ paribhāvitaṃ parivardhitaṃ pratilabhya [sva]jīvitasya bṛddhau hrāse vaśitāṃ vindate |
SA16n1278:5462: kecidāhuḥ-prathamadhyānābhijñayā brahmalokaṃ gacchati yāvaccaturthadhyānābhijñayā rūpaparyantaṃ gacchatīti |
SA16n1278:5473: yathoktaṃ sūtre rūpe vā ārūpye vā pūrvatanīnamupapattyāyatanaṃ bhagavān sarvaṃ prajānāti |
SA16n1278:5479: (pṛ) sūtra uktam-ālokalakṣaṇaṃ bhāvayan jñānadarśanaṃ sādhayati iti |
SA16n1278:5491: (pṛ) divyacakṣuṣaḥ saṃsthānaṃ kiṃ mahat kiṃ vālpam |
SA16n1278:5509: yathā sāsraveṇa sāsravaṃ jānāti anāsraveṇa anāsravaṃ jānāti iti |
SA16n1278:5511: neme vadanti kāraṇaniyamam-anena kāraṇena sajātīyamevālambanaṃ jānātīti |
SA16n1278:5515: yathā kaścidavitarkasamādhimupasampannaḥ prajānāti asmāt samādhervyutthite evamevaṃ vitarko bhaviṣyatīti |
SA16n1278:5520: āha ca-pratyekabuddho mārgasatyadarśanagatatṛtīyacittaṃ jñāsyāmīti saptamaṃ cittameva paśyati |
SA16n1278:5528: kiñcaikasmin samaye manasyacintayat-rājā bhūtvā yathādharmaṃ lokaṃ vineṣyāmīti |
SA16n1278:5530: devā api jānanti-ayamarhan yāvadayaṃ strotaāpattipratipannaka iti |
SA16n1278:5532: tadyathā bhagavati parinirvāṇābhimukhe sati anirūddho bhagavatopasampannān dhyānasamādhīn yathākramamajānīt |
SA16n1278:5560: yathā śāriputraḥ bhagavantaṃ pratyāha-ahamatītānāgatānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ cittamajānannapi teṣāṃ dharmaṃ jānāmīti |
SA16n1278:5562: (pṛ) pūrvanivāsā[nusmṛti] vibhaṅge kasmāduktaṃ saha nimittena saha jātyeti |
SA16n1278:5563: (u) anusmṛtirviśadetyata evaṃ nimittasaṃjñāmavocat amukaḥ pudgalaḥ ityādi |
SA16n1278:5566: yathāhuḥ-idaṃ tava kulaṃ iyaṃ tava jātiriti |
SA16n1278:5567: jātiṃ nimittañca militvā vadatītyato jñānadarśanaṃ viśuddham |
SA16n1278:5579: asti hi pudgalasya aṣṭamahāsahasrakalpān jānato'pi nāstīyaṃ cintāmayī prajñā |
SA16n1278:5589: sūtre kasmāduktam-ahamekanavatikalpānāgatya nāpaśyaṃ [kimapi] dānamapacīyamānaṃ vinā vipākena iti |
SA16n1278:5627: (u) uktameva pūrvaṃ dhyānasamādhīn gabhīraṃ bhāvayan ṛddhipādān sākṣātkarotīti |
SA16n1278:5631: yathoktaṃ sūtre-tathāgate loka utpanne supuruṣā dharmaṃ śrutvā pravrajitāḥ śīlaṃ samādadānā apanītapañca nīvaraṇāḥ samādhiṃ bhāvayantaḥ satyaṃ paśyanti ityādi sarvamāsravakṣayasyopāyāḥ |
SA16n1278:5651: yathā paśyāmaḥ stanyaṃ śuṣyat punaḥ prasravati |
SA16n1278:5652: asti kaścit kālaḥ [yadā] stanyaṃ pratiruddhapayaḥprasūti bhavati |
SA16n1278:5655: yathā ca tapte'yasi kṛṣṇalakṣaṇaṃ niruddhaṃ punarutpadyate |
SA16n1278:5659: yasmin samaye nimittāni niruddhāni na punarutpadyante |
SA16n1278:5665: yadi kiścit cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā mithyāmanaskāreṇa mithyā vikalpayati |
SA16n1278:5668: (u) yadyogī pañcasu skandheṣu prajñaptaṃ sattvaṃ na paśyati |
SA16n1278:5678: teṣu dharmeṣu virajo dharmacakṣuḥ pratilabhata iti |
SA16n1278:5684: śaikṣāḥ punaḥ prajānanti-te tucchā riktā māyāvaditi |
SA16n1278:5686: ato jñāyate yayā prajñayā dharmāṇāṃ nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti iyamāsravakṣayajñānasākṣātkriyābhijñeti ||
SA16n1278:5689: (pṛ) sūtra uktam-yo yogī saptabhirupāyaistribhirarthāvalokanaiḥ samanvitaḥ so'smin dharme kṣipramāsravakṣayamanuprāpnotīti |
SA16n1278:5691: (u) saptopāyā nāma śrutamayī prajñā cintāmayī prajñā ca |
SA16n1278:5694: ayaṃ rūpasamudayaḥ ayaṃ rūpanirodhaḥ iyaṃ rūpanirodhagāminī pratipat,
SA16n1278:5699: (u) yadyapīyaṃ śrutamayī cintāmayī prajñā tathāpyevaṃ pañcaskandhān vikalpayan ātmamatiṃ vibhedayati |
SA16n1278:5701: trividhāvalokanajñānaṃ yaduta saṃskārā anityā duḥkhā anātmāna iti |
SA16n1278:5702: skandhadhātvāyatanamukhena saṃskārān paśyato nāstyartho hitaṃ vā |
SA16n1278:5703: (pṛ) tathā cet pūrvamādīnava uktameva-anityā duḥkhā iti |
SA16n1278:5708: pūrvaṃ śrutamayyāṃ cintāmayyāṃ prajñāyāmuktāḥ sapta prakārāḥ |
SA16n1278:5711: yadanityaṃ tat duḥkhamiti lakṣaṇasya bhaṅgo nāma anityasya bhaṅgaḥ nānityasaṃskārāṇāṃ bhaṅgaḥ |
SA16n1278:5718: (pṛ) yogino'pi buddhe dharme saṅghe śīladiṣu kṣāntirasti |
SA16n1278:5724: pūrvaṃ hi mārgānukūlāṃ cintāmayīṃ prajñāṃ prayujya paścātpratyakṣajñānamanuprāpnoti |
SA16n1278:5725: yathā hastipakaḥ pūrvaṃ hastipadaṃ dṛṣṭvā tena jñānena prajānāti-atra vartata iti |
SA16n1278:5727: tathā yogyapi pūrvaṃ kṣāntyā'nvayajñāne na nirvāṇamabhyūhya paścāt tena jñānenābhimukhīkaroti |
SA16n1278:5728: ataḥ sūtra uktam-[evaṃ] jānan[evaṃ] paśyan āsravakṣayamanuprāpnotīti ||
SA16n1278:5731: (pṛ) kecidābhidharmikā vadanti arhan kṣayajñānaṃ sākṣātkurvan sāṃvṛtāni nava jñānāni prāpnoti yaduta kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalamavyākṛtaṃ [jñānaṃ] yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanapratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalamavyākṛtaṃ [jñāna]m |
SA16n1278:5742: (pṛ) yo vītarāgaḥ san na prathamadhyānasamāpattiṃ nādyāpi pratyakṣīkṛtavān |
SA16n1278:5746: (pṛ) yadi rāgādvirajyamānasyātītānāgatāni sarvāṇi dhyānāni mūlataḥ prāpnāni |
SA16n1278:5748: (u) anāgataṃ karma akṛtamabhūtaṃ na vipākaṃ prāpayati |
SA16n1278:5749: atītāni dhyānāni citta utpannacarāṇi yadi vipākaṃ prayacchanti |
SA16n1278:5762: tadā'nāgate'dhvani samy dṛṣṭiṃ prāpnoti kaścidārūpyasamādhiṃ niśrityārhatphalaṃ prāpnoti |
SA16n1278:5763: ayamanāgate samyaksaṅkalpaṃ samyagvācaṃ samyakkarmāntaṃ samyagājīvaṃ prāpnoti |
SA16n1278:5768: yadi ca nāsti anāgata [dharmaḥ] kathaṃ bhāvako phalāni dhyānasamādhyādīnanuprāpsyati |
SA16n1278:5771: tathā no cet phalāni gaṇayitvā gaṇayitvā'nuprāpnuyāt |
SA16n1278:5782: yathā manuṣyajātiḥ prāptetyato manuṣyalakṣaṇaṃ prāptaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1278:5785: (pṛ) yogino vidyamānaduḥkhādīnāṃ jñānāni kramikāṇīti sarvaṃ parihṛtameva |
SA16n1278:5789: tadā prāptiḥ prayoga iti nāsti bhedaḥ |
SA16n1278:5798: yathā samāpattapañcaśīlaḥ punaḥ pravrajyāsaṃvaramanuprāpnuvannapi na maulikaśīlebhyaḥ parihīyate |
SA16n1278:5800: yathā kaścidādau vastu jānannapi viśiṣṭavastu[darśanāya yatata] iti pravibhāgo'sti |
SA16n1278:5806: (pṛ) imāni laukikajñānāni kṣayajñānena sahārhataḥ samādhisamāpattivyutthānacittakriyāṃ prāpayanti |
SA16n1278:5810: tathā no cet na navajñānāni prāpnuyāt |
SA16n1278:5811: uktañca-anāgatabhāvanāyā nāsti hetuḥ pratyayo vā iti |
SA16n1278:5813: ete hi vadanti-satyadarśanamārge kevalaṃ nimittābhāsaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvayati |
SA16n1278:5820: śraddhāvibhukto darśanaprāptatvena parivartamānaḥ sarvasminnānantaryavimuktimārge na sāṃvṛtaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayati |
SA16n1278:5821: samayavimuktaḥ akopyavimuktatayā parivartamāno navānantarya[mārgeṣu] aṣṭavimokṣamārgeṣu saṃvṛtaṃ mārgaṃ na bhāvayati |
SA16n1278:5825: ato bhavān yadi vā samyagdyetuṃ brūyāt yadi vā śraddhāpayet |
SA16n1278:5827: ūṣma[gatā]diṣu sthitikāle uttamāni sarvāṇi kuśalamūlāni bhāvayati |
SA16n1278:5830: ata ūṣmagatādidharmakālāt yāvat kṣayajñānaṃ sarveṣāṃ bhāvanā bhavati |
SA16n1278:5839: yathoktaṃ sūtre-bhagavānānandamāmantryāha-asmin dharme evaṃ jñānena dṛṣṭvā evaṃ pratibudhyasva |
SA16n1278:5845: kiñcāha-pratyutpannāḥ kāmā anāgatāḥ kāmāśca mārasenā māradheyā mārabandhanā ityādau sarvatrocyate pratyutpannavādaḥ |
SA16n1278:5858: dharmajñānamanvayajñānaṃ paracittajñānaṃ duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayajñānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānañca sarvaṃ sāsravamanāsravamasti |
SA16n1278:5859: imāni jñānāni ūṣmagatādidharmeṣu sāsravāṇi niyāmāvakrāntiprāpyāṇi anāsravāṇi |
SA16n1278:5860: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ-kāma [sampratiyukteṣu] saṃskāreṣu [yadanāsravaṃ] jñānaṃ [kāmasampratiyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ] hetau [yadanāsravaṃ] jñānaṃ [kāmasampratiyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ] nirodhe [yadanāsravaṃ] jñānaṃ [kāmasampratiyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ] prahāṇāya mārge [yadanāsravaṃ] jñānam,
SA16n1278:5862: rūpārūpyasampratiyukteṣu saṃskāreṣu yadanāsravaṃ jñānaṃ rūpārūpyasampratiyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ hetau yadanāsravaṃ jñānaṃ rūpārūpyasampratiyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nirodhe yadanāsravaṃ jñānaṃ rūpārūpyasampratiyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ prahāṇāya mārge yadanāsravaṃ jñānam,
SA16n1278:5873: pratyakṣamālokya ca janma duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaṃ tathātītamapīti viddhi |
SA16n1278:5874: yathā ca tat duḥkhamidañca duḥkhaṃ tathānāgatamapyavehi |
SA16n1278:5875: [bījasvabhāvo hi yatheha dṛṣṭo bhūto'pi bhavyo'pi tathānumeyaḥ |]
SA16n1278:5876: patyakṣataśca jvalano yathoṣṇo bhūto'pi bhavyo'pi tathoṣṇa eva || iti |
SA16n1278:5881: yogī hi atīte'nāgāmini pratyutpanne ca duḥkhe nirvidyate |
SA16n1278:5892: tadarthameva ābhidharmikā āhuḥ-asti prāptiraprāptirityato'nupūrveṇa satyaṃ paśyatīti |
SA16n1278:5895: ata ekasmin samaya ubhayajñānaṃ na sambhavati |
SA16n1278:5904: yogī anityaṃ duḥkhamiti paśyan śūnyamanātmeti paśyati |
SA16n1278:5911: yathoktam-adhyātmavimuktatvāt tṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣaye nirodhe svata evārhan prāpta ityucyate |
SA16n1278:5913: (pṛ) nanu sūtre kiṃ noktaṃ sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ prahāṇaṃ prahāṇalakṣaṇamiti |
SA16n1278:5914: (u) ayaṃ yogī adhyātmanirodhaṃ sākṣātkṛrvan sarvatra nirviṇṇaḥ |
SA16n1278:5921: (u) evaṃ darśane sati skandhānāmanityatādidoṣamapi dṛṣṭvā duḥkhanātmasaṃjñāṃ janayati |
SA16n1278:5927: ātmana utpādo vyayaḥ syādityato jñāyate anātmeti |
SA16n1278:5932: evaṃ yoginaḥ samyak anityamanātma ca bhāvayataḥ kāyacittamupaśāmyati |
SA16n1278:5933: sarvasaṃskāreṣu samutpanneṣu teṣāṃ vihiṃsāmanubhavato duḥkhasaṃjñā samutpadyate |
SA16n1278:5936: mūḍhastu ātmasaṃjñāvaśātsatyapi mahati duḥkhe na tadupāyāsamanubhavati |
SA16n1278:5946: yathoktaṃ sūtre-abhūtanimittamidamabhūtaṃ saṃjñāmātramiti prajānato duḥkhāni kṣīyanta iti |
SA16n1278:5950: yathoktaṃ sūtre-kaścidarhan tathāgatasya purato vyākaroti-bhagavatā deśitāni na santi mama |
SA16n1278:5952: sadā mama samāhitaikāgrasya samyak caryāmanusmarataḥ kāmādīnyakuśalāni na cittasyāsravā bhavanti iti |
SA16n1278:5957: yathā sthāṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā ayaṃ puruṣa iti saṃśerate |
SA16n1278:5959: sadā animittavihāricittatvāt pūrvaṃ sattvaśūnyatāṃ dṛṣṭvā pañcasu skandheṣu na paśyatyātmānam |
SA16n1278:5971: yathā kaścit tatra tatra pratibaddha ekasmānmukto'pi na vimukta ityucyate |
SA16n1278:5979: kṛtaṃ karaṇīyamiti karaṇīyāni sarvāṇi kṛtvā prajānāti-asmādbhavāt nāsti bhavāntaramiti |
SA16n1278:5980: ato jñāyate arhanneva sarveṣu karaṇīyeṣu vaśitāṃ prāptaḥ kṣayajñānenānutpādajñānena ca samanvitaḥ syāt,
SA16n1278:5985: jitvā mṛtyorhi senāñca viharāmi anāsravaḥ || iti |
SA16n1278:5993: (u) yo jinauraso jānāti dharmāḥ pratītyasamutpannā iti |
SA16n1278:6001: (pṛ) sūtra uktam-catuścattvāriṃśat jñānāni yaduta jarāmaraṇe jñānaṃ,
SA16n1278:6012: yathoktaṃ sūtre-[tadyathā] nagarasvāmī nagare niṣaṇṇaḥ syāt |
SA16n1278:6013: [tatra] kiñcit dūtayugamekasmāt dvārādāgatyopasṛtya nagarasvāmino yathābhūtaṃ vacanaṃ niryātya [yathāgatamārgaṃ] pratipadyeta |
SA16n1278:6020: dūtā nānādvārebhya āgatā api ekameva sthānamupasarpanti |
SA16n1278:6022: yathā rāhula ekānte niṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ cintayan evaṃ prajānāti-īdṛśo dharma parikīrtitaṃ nirvāṇaṃ prati anuprayātīti |
SA16n1278:6023: kiñca bhagavān dharmasyāniśaṃsāyāmāha-dharmo'yaṃ sarvān kleśāgnīna nirodhayatīti nirodha ityucyate |
SA16n1278:6031: ato jñāyate pañcaskandhādayo dvārāṇi nirvāṇaparāyaṇāni bhavanti |
SA16n1278:6040: (pṛ) ucyate ca jarāmaraṇasamudayaḥ jarāmaraṇanirodho jarāmaraṇanirodhamārga ityādi |
SA16n1278:6061: tatra kasmānnoktaṃ-jarāmaraṇasya svabhāvo nirodho mārga ityādi |
SA16n1278:6064: tīrthikā bahavo nidāne bhrāntā vadanti-laukikānāṃ padārthānāṃ heturlokātmaka ityādi |
SA16n1278:6075: (u) pratyutpannamatītādhvanaḥ kadācidbhinnadharma bhavati yadutātītānāṃ sattvānāmāyurapramāṇaṃ prabhāvaśca devatulya ityevamādi |
SA16n1278:6076: āyurādi bhinnaṃ jarāmaraṇapratyayo'pi bhinno bhavediti janā vadeyuriti bhītyā niyama ucyate |
SA16n1278:6084: kasmāt tatra rūpasya svarūpaṃ nirodhaḥ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya ca svarūpaṃ nirodhaḥ |
SA16n1278:6086: yathoktaṃ sūtre-yo bhikṣavaḥ saptabhiḥ sthānopāyaiḥ tribhirvipaśyanārthaiśca samanvitaḥ sa kṣipramāsravāṇāṃ kṣayamanuprāpnoti |
SA16n1278:6088: ityādi nidānajñānāni apramāṇaśatasahasrāṇi santi yaduta cakṣurvijñānamityādi |
SA16n1278:6102: kāmarāgasya mithyāvitarkaḥ pratyayaḥ ityevamādipratyayānāṃ jñānamapramāṇamanavadhi svayamevonnetavyam ||
